41014057	Some stood up , and gave false testimony against him , saying ,
41014058	" We heard him say , ' I will destroy this temple that is made with hands , and in three days I will build another made without hands . ' "
41014059	Even so their testimony did not agree .
41014060	The high priest stood up in the midst , and asked Jesus , " Have you no answer ? What is it which these testify against you ? "
41014061	But he stayed quiet , and answered nothing . Again the high priest asked him , " Are you the Christ , the Son of the Blessed ? "
41014062	Jesus said , " I AM . You will see the Son of Man sitting at the right hand of Power , and coming with the clouds of the sky . "
41014063	The high priest tore his clothes , and said , " What further need have we of witnesses ?
41014064	You have heard the blasphemy ! What do you think ? " They all condemned him to be worthy of death .
41014065	Some began to spit on him , and to cover his face , and to beat him with fists , and to tell him , " Prophesy ! " The officers struck him with the palms of their hands .
41014066	As Peter was beneath in the court , one of the maids of the high priest came ,
41014067	and seeing Peter warming himself , she looked at him , and said , " You were also with the Nazarene , Jesus . "
41014068	But he denied it , saying , " I neither know , nor understand what you are saying . " He went out into the porch , and the cock crowed .
41014069	The maid saw him , and began again to tell those who stood by , " This is one of them . "
41014070	But he again denied it . After a little while again those who stood by said to Peter , " You truly are one of them , for you are a Galilean , and your speech shows it . "
41014071	But he began to curse , and to swear , " I don't know this man of whom you speak ! "
41014072	The cock crowed the second time . Peter remembered the word , how that Jesus said to him , " Before the cock crows twice , you will deny me three times . " When he thought about that , he wept .
41015001	Immediately in the morning the chief priests , with the elders and scribes , and the whole council , held a consultation , and bound Jesus , and carried him away , and delivered him up to Pilate .
41015002	Pilate asked him , " Are you the King of the Jews ? " He answered , " So you say . "
41015003	The chief priests accused him of many things .
41015004	Pilate again asked him , " Have you no answer ? See how many things they testify against you ! "
41015005	But Jesus made no further answer , so Pilate marveled .
41015006	Now at the feast he used to release to them one prisoner , whom they asked of him .
41015007	There was one called Barabbas , bound with those who had made insurrection , men who in the insurrection had committed murder .
41015008	The multitude , crying aloud , began to ask him to do as he always did for them .
41015009	Pilate answered them , saying , " Do you you want me to release to you the King of the Jews ? "
41015010	For he perceived that for envy the chief priests had delivered him up .
41015011	But the chief priests stirred up the multitude , that he should release Barabbas to them instead .
41015012	Pilate again asked them , " What then should I do to him whom you call the King of the Jews ? "
41015013	They cried out again , " Crucify him ! "
41015014	Pilate said to them , " Why , what evil has he done ? " But they cried out exceedingly , " Crucify him ! "
41015015	Pilate , wishing to please the multitude , released Barabbas to them , and delivered Jesus , when he had flogged him , to be crucified .
41015016	The soldiers led him away within the court , which is the Praetorium ; and they called together the whole cohort .
41015017	They clothed him with purple , and weaving a crown of thorns , they put it on him .
41015018	They began to salute him , " Hail , King of the Jews ! "
41015019	They struck his head with a reed , and spat on him , and bowing their knees , did homage to him .
41015020	When they had mocked him , they took the purple off of him , and put his own garments on him . They led him out to crucify him .
41015021	They compelled one passing by , coming from the country , Simon of Cyrene , the father of Alexander and Rufus , to go with them , that he might bear his cross .
41015022	They brought him to the place called Golgotha , which is , being interpreted , " The place of a skull . "
41015023	They offered him wine mixed with myrrh to drink , but he didn't take it .
41015024	Crucifying him , they parted his garments among them , casting lots on them , what each should take .
41015025	It was the third hour , and they crucified him .
41015026	The superscription of his accusation was written over him , " THE KING OF THE JEWS . "
41015027	With him they crucified two robbers ; one on his right hand , and one on his left .
41015028	The scripture was fulfilled , which says , " He was numbered with transgressors . "
41015029	Those who passed by blasphemed him , wagging their heads , and saying , " Ha ! You who destroy the temple , and build it in three days ,
41015030	save yourself , and come down from the cross ! "
41015031	Likewise , also the chief priests mocking among themselves with the scribes said , " He saved others . He can't save himself .
41015032	Let the Christ , the King of Israel , now come down from the cross , that we may see and believe him . " Those who were crucified with him reproached him .
41015033	When the sixth hour had come , there was darkness over the whole land until the ninth hour .
41015034	At the ninth hour Jesus cried with a loud voice , saying , " Eloi , Eloi , lama sabachthani ? " which is , being interpreted , " My God , my God , why have you forsaken me ? "
41015035	Some of those who stood by , when they heard it , said , " Behold , he calls Elijah . "
41015036	One ran , and filling a sponge full of vinegar , put it on a reed , and gave it to him to drink , saying , " Let him be . Let's see whether Elijah comes to take him down . "
41015037	Jesus cried out with a loud voice , and gave up the spirit .
41015038	The veil of the temple was torn in two from the top to the bottom .
41015039	When the centurion , who stood by opposite him , saw that he cried out like this and breathed his last , he said , " Truly this man was the Son of God ! "
41015040	There were also women watching from afar , among whom were both Mary Magdalene , and Mary the mother of James the less and of Joses , and Salome ;
41015041	who , when he was in Galilee , followed him , and served him ; and many other women who came up with him to Jerusalem .
41015042	When evening had now come , because it was the Preparation , that is , the day before the Sabbath ,
41015043	Joseph of Arimathaea , a member of the council of honorable estate , who also himself was looking for the kingdom of God , came . He boldly went in to Pilate , and asked for Jesus ' body .
41015044	Pilate marveled if he were already dead : and calling to him the centurion , he asked him whether he had been dead for a while .
41015045	When he learned it from the centurion , he granted the body to Joseph .
41015046	He bought a linen cloth , and taking him down , wound him in the linen cloth , and laid him in a tomb which had been cut out of a rock . He rolled a stone against the door of the tomb .
41015047	Mary Magdalene and Mary , the mother of Joses , saw where he was laid .
41016001	When the Sabbath was past , Mary Magdalene , and Mary the mother of James , and Salome , bought spices , that they might come and anoint him .
41016002	Very early on the first day of the week , they came to the tomb when the sun had risen .
41016003	They were saying among themselves , " Who will roll away the stone from the door of the tomb for us ? "
41016004	for it was very big . Looking up , they saw that the stone was rolled back
41016005	Entering into the tomb , they saw a young man sitting on the right side , dressed in a white robe , and they were amazed .
41016006	He said to them , " Don't be amazed . You seek Jesus , the Nazarene , who has been crucified . He has risen . He is not here . Behold , the place where they laid him !
41016007	But go , tell his disciples and Peter , ' He goes before you into Galilee . There you will see him , as he said to you . ' "
41016008	They went out , and fled from the tomb , for trembling and astonishment had come on them . They said nothing to anyone ; for they were afraid .
41016009	Now when he had risen early on the first day of the week , he appeared first to Mary Magdalene , from whom he had cast out seven demons .
41016010	She went and told those who had been with him , as they mourned and wept .
41016011	When they heard that he was alive , and had been seen by her , they disbelieved .
41016012	After these things he was revealed in another form to two of them , as they walked , on their way into the country .
41016013	They went away and told it to the rest . They didn't believe them , either .
41016014	Afterward he was revealed to the eleven themselves as they sat at the table , and he rebuked them for their unbelief and hardness of heart , because they didn't believe those who had seen him after he had risen .
41016015	He said to them , " Go into all the world , and preach the gospel to the whole creation .
41016016	He who believes and is baptized will be saved ; but he who disbelieves will be condemned .
41016017	These signs will accompany those who believe : in my name they will cast out demons ; they will speak with new languages ;
41016018	they will take up serpents , and if they drink any deadly thing , it will in no way hurt them ; they will lay hands on the sick , and they will recover . "
41016019	So then the Lord Jesus , after he had spoken to them , was received up into heaven , and sat down at the right hand of God .
41016020	They went forth , and preached everywhere , the Lord working with them , and confirming the word by the signs that followed . Amen .
42001001	Because many have undertaken to draw up a narrative concerning those matters which have been fulfilled among us ,
42001002	even as they delivered them to us , who from the beginning were eyewitnesses and ministers of the word ,
42001003	it seemed good to me also , having traced the course of all things accurately from the first , to write to you in order , most excellent Theophilus ;
42001004	that you might know the certainty concerning the things in which you were instructed .
42001005	There was in the days of Herod , the king of Judea , a certain priest named Zacharias , of the priestly division of Abijah . He had a wife of the daughters of Aaron , and her name was Elizabeth .
42001006	They were both righteous before God , walking blamelessly in all the commandments and ordinances of the Lord .
42001007	But they had no child , because Elizabeth was barren , and they both were well advanced in years .
42001008	Now it happened , while he executed the priest's office before God in the order of his division ,
42001009	according to the custom of the priest's office , his lot was to enter into the temple of the Lord and burn incense .
42001010	The whole multitude of the people were praying outside at the hour of incense .
42001011	An angel of the Lord appeared to him , standing on the right side of the altar of incense .
42001012	Zacharias was troubled when he saw him , and fear fell on him .
42001013	But the angel said to him , " Don't be afraid , Zacharias , because your request has been heard , and your wife , Elizabeth , will bear you a son , and you shall call his name John .
42001014	You will have joy and gladness ; and many will rejoice at his birth .
42001015	For he will be great in the sight of the Lord , and he will drink no wine nor strong drink . He will be filled with the Holy Spirit , even from his mother's womb .
42001016	He will turn many of the children of Israel to the Lord , their God .
42001017	He will go before his face in the spirit and power of Elijah , ' to turn the hearts of the fathers to the children , ' and the disobedient to the wisdom of the just ; to make ready a people prepared for the Lord . "
42001018	Zacharias said to the angel , " How can I be sure of this ? For I am an old man , and my wife is well advanced in years . "
42001019	The angel answered him , " I am Gabriel , who stands in the presence of God . I was sent to speak to you , and to bring you this good news .
42001020	Behold , you will be silent and not able to speak , until the day that these things will happen , because you didn't believe my words , which will be fulfilled in their proper time . "
42001021	The people were waiting for Zacharias , and they marveled while he delayed in the temple .
42001022	When he came out , he could not speak to them , and they perceived that he had seen a vision in the temple . He continued making signs to them , and remained mute .
42001023	It happened , when the days of his service were fulfilled , he departed to his house .
42001024	After these days Elizabeth , his wife , conceived , and she hid herself five months , saying ,
42001025	" Thus has the Lord done to me in the days in which he looked at me , to take away my reproach among men . "
42001026	Now in the sixth month , the angel Gabriel was sent from God to a city of Galilee , named Nazareth ,
42001027	to a virgin pledged to be married to a man whose name was Joseph , of the house of David . The virgin's name was Mary .
42001028	Having come in to her , the angel said , " Rejoice , you highly favored one ! The Lord is with you . Blessed are you among women ! "
42001029	But when she saw him , she was greatly troubled at the saying , and considered what kind of salutation this might be .
42001030	The angel said to her , " Don't be afraid , Mary , for you have found favor with God .
42001031	Behold , you will conceive in your womb , and bring forth a son , and will call his name JESUS .
42001032	He will be great , and will be called the Son of the Most High . The Lord God will give to him the throne of his father , David ,
42001033	and he will reign over the house of Jacob forever . There will be no end of his kingdom . "
42001034	Mary said to the angel , " How will this be , seeing I am a virgin ? "
42001035	The angel answered her , " The Holy Spirit will come on you , and the power of the Most High will overshadow you . Therefore also the holy one which is born from you will be called the Son of God .
42001036	Behold , Elizabeth , your relative , also has conceived a son in her old age ; and this is the sixth month with her who was called barren .
42001037	For no word from God will be void of power . "
42001038	Mary said , " Behold , the handmaid of the Lord ; be it to me according to your word . " The angel departed from her .
42001039	Mary arose in those days and went into the hill country with haste , into a city of Judah ,
42001040	and entered into the house of Zacharias and greeted Elizabeth .
42001041	It happened , when Elizabeth heard Mary's greeting , the baby leaped in her womb , and Elizabeth was filled with the Holy Spirit .
42001042	She called out with a loud voice , and said , " Blessed are you among women , and blessed is the fruit of your womb !
42001043	Why am I so favored , that the mother of my Lord should come to me ?
42001044	For behold , when the voice of your greeting came into my ears , the baby leaped in my womb for joy !
42001045	Blessed is she who believed , for there will be a fulfillment of the things which have been spoken to her from the Lord ! "
42001046	Mary said , " My soul magnifies the Lord .
42001047	My spirit has rejoiced in God my Savior ,
42001048	For he has looked at the humble state of his handmaid . For behold , from now on , all generations will call me blessed .
42001049	For he who is mighty has done to me great things ; Holy is his name .
42001050	His mercy is for generations of generations on those who fear him .
42001051	He has shown strength with his arm . He has scattered the proud in the imagination of their heart .
42001052	He has put down princes from their thrones . Has exalted the lowly .
42001053	He has filled the hungry with good things . He has sent the rich away empty .
42001054	He has given help to Israel , his servant , that he might remember mercy
42001055	( As he spoke to our fathers ) Toward Abraham and his seed forever . "
42001056	Mary stayed with her about three months , and returned to her house .
42001057	Now the time that Elizabeth should give birth was fulfilled , and she brought forth a son .
42001058	Her neighbors and her relatives heard that the Lord had magnified his mercy towards her ; and they rejoiced with her .
42001059	It happened on the eighth day , that they came to circumcise the child ; and they would have called him Zacharias , after the name of the father .
42001060	His mother answered , " Not so ; but he will be called John . "
42001061	They said to her , " There is no one among your relatives who is called by this name . "

42001072	To show mercy towards our fathers , To remember his holy covenant ,
42001073	The oath which he spoke to Abraham , our father ,

42001078	Because of the tender mercy of our God , Whereby the dawn from on high will visit us ,
42001079	To shine on those who sit in darkness and the shadow of death ; To guide our feet into the way of peace . "
42001080	The child grew , and grew strong in spirit , and was in the desert until the day of his public appearance to Israel .

42002009	Behold , an angel of the Lord stood by them , and the glory of the Lord shone around them , and they were terrified .

42004001	Jesus , full of the Holy Spirit , returned from the Jordan , and was led by the Spirit into the wilderness
42004002	for forty days , being tempted by the devil . He ate nothing in those days . Afterward , when they were completed , he was hungry .
42004003	The devil said to him , " If you are the Son of God , command this stone to become bread . "
42004004	Jesus answered him , saying , " It is written , ' Man will not live by bread alone , but by every word of God . ' "
42004005	The devil , leading him up on a high mountain , showed him all the kingdoms of the inhabited world in a moment of time .
42004006	The devil said to him , " I will give you all this authority , and their glory , for it has been delivered to me ; and I give it to whomever I want .
42004007	If you therefore will worship before me , it will all be yours . "

42004009	He led him to Jerusalem , and set him on the pinnacle of the temple , and said to him , " If you are the Son of God , cast yourself down from here ,
42004010	for it is written , ' He will give his angels charge concerning you , to guard you ; '
42004011	and , ' On their hands they will bear you up , Lest perhaps you dash your foot against a stone . ' "
42004012	Jesus answering , said to him , " It has been said , ' You shall not tempt the Lord your God . ' "

42004020	He closed the book , gave it back to the attendant , and sat down . The eyes of all in the synagogue were fastened on him .

42004022	All testified about him , and wondered at the words of grace which proceeded out of his mouth , and they said , " Isn't this Joseph's son ? "

42004024	He said , " Most assuredly I tell you , no prophet is acceptable in his hometown .
42004025	But truly I tell you , there were many widows in Israel in the days of Elijah , when the the sky was shut up three years and six months , when a great famine came over all the land .
42004026	Elijah was sent to none of them , except only to Zarephath , in the land of Sidon , to a woman who was a widow .
42004027	There were many lepers in Israel in the time of Elisha the prophet , yet not one of them was cleansed , except Naaman , the Syrian . "
42004028	They were all filled with wrath in the synagogue , as they heard these things ;
42004029	and they rose up , and threw him out of the city , and led him to the brow of the hill that their city was built on , that they might throw him off the cliff .
42004030	But he , passing through the midst of them , went his way .
42004031	He came down to Capernaum , a city of Galilee . He was teaching them on the Sabbath day ,
42004032	and they were astonished at his teaching , for his word was with authority .

42004039	He stood over her , and rebuked the fever ; and it left her . Immediately she rose up and ministered to them .

42005001	Now it happened , while the multitude pressed on him and heard the word of God , that he was standing by the lake of Gennesaret .

42005006	When they had done this , they caught a great multitude of fish , and their net was breaking .
42005007	They beckoned to their partners in the other boat , that they should come and help them . They came , and filled both boats , so that they began to sink .

42005037	No one puts new wine into old wineskins , or else the new wine will burst the skins , and it will be spilled , and the skins will be destroyed .
42005038	But new wine must be put into fresh wineskins , and both are preserved .
42005039	No man having drunk old wine immediately desires new , for he says , ' The old is better . ' "

42006024	" But woe to you who are rich ! For you have received your consolation .
42006025	" Woe to you , you who are full now ! For you will be hungry . " Woe to you , you who laugh now ! For you will mourn and weep .
42006026	" Woe , when men will speak well of you ! For their fathers did the same thing to the false prophets .
42006027	But I tell you who hear , love your enemies , do good to those who hate you ,
42006028	bless them who curse you , and pray for those who insult you .
42006029	To him who strikes you on the cheek , offer also the other ; and from him who takes away your cloak , don't withhold your coat also .
42006030	Give to everyone who asks you , and don't ask him who takes away your goods to give them back again .
42006031	" As you desire that men should do to you , likewise do to them also .
42006032	If you love those who love you , what credit is that to you ? For even sinners love those who love them .
42006033	If you do good to those who do good to you , what credit is that to you ? For even sinners do the same .
42006034	If you lend to those from whom you hope to receive , what credit is that to you ? Even sinners lend to sinners , to receive back as much .
42006035	But love your enemies , and do good , and lend , expecting nothing back ; and your reward will be great , and you will be sons of the Most High ; for he is kind toward the unthankful and evil .
42006036	Therefore be merciful , even as your Father is also merciful .
42006037	Don't judge , and you will not be judged . Don't condemn , and you will not be condemned . Set free , and you will be set free .

42006039	He spoke a parable to them . " Can the blind guide the blind ? Won't they both fall into a pit ?
42006040	A disciple is not above his teacher , but everyone when he is fully trained will be like his teacher .
42006041	Why do you see the speck of chaff that is in your brother's eye , but don't consider the beam that is in your own eye ?
42006042	Or how can you tell your brother , ' Brother , let me remove the speck of chaff that is in your eye , ' when you yourself don't see the beam that is in your own eye ? You hypocrite ! First remove the beam from your own eye , and then you can see clearly to remove the speck of chaff that is in your brother's eye .
42006043	For there is no good tree that brings forth rotten fruit ; nor again a rotten tree that brings forth good fruit .
42006044	For each tree is known by its own fruit . For people don't gather figs from thorns , nor do they gather grapes from a bramble bush .
42006045	The good man out of the good treasure of his heart brings forth that which is good , and the evil man out of the evil treasure of his heart brings forth that which is evil , for out of the abundance of the heart , his mouth speaks .

42006047	Everyone who comes to me , and hears my words , and does them , I will show you who he is like .
42006048	He is like a man building a house , who dug and went deep , and laid a foundation on the rock . When a flood arose , the stream broke against that house , and could not shake it , because it was founded on the rock .
42006049	But he who hears , and doesn't do , is like a man who built a house on the earth without a foundation , against which the stream broke , and immediately it fell , and the ruin of that house was great . "

42008001	It happened soon afterwards , that he went about through cities and villages , preaching and bringing the good news of the kingdom of God , and with him the twelve ,
42008002	and certain women who had been healed of evil spirits and infirmities : Mary who was called Magdalene , from whom seven demons had gone out ;
42008003	and Joanna , the wife of Chuzas , Herod's steward , Susanna ; and many others ; who ministered to them from their possessions .
42008004	When a great multitude came together , and people from every city were coming to him , he spoke by a parable .
42008005	" The farmer went out to sow his seed . As he sowed , some fell by the road , and it was trampled under foot , and the birds of the sky devoured it .
42008006	Other seed fell on the rock , and as soon as it grew , it withered away , because it had no moisture .
42008007	Other fell amid the thorns , and the thorns grew with it , and choked it .
42008008	Other fell into the good ground , and grew , and brought forth fruit one hundred times . " As he said these things , he called out , " He who has ears to hear , let him hear ! "
42008009	Then his disciples asked him , " What does this parable mean ? "
42008010	He said , " To you it is given to know the mysteries of the kingdom of God , but to the rest in parables ; that ' seeing they may not see , and hearing they may not understand . '
42008011	Now the parable is this : The seed is the word of God .
42008012	Those by the road are those who hear , then the devil comes , and takes away the word from their heart , that they may not believe and be saved .
42008013	Those on the rock are they who , when they hear , receive the word with joy ; but these have no root , who believe for a while , and fall away in time of temptation .
42008014	That which fell among the thorns , these are those who have heard , and as they go on their way they are choked with cares , riches , and pleasures of life , and bring no fruit to maturity .
42008015	That in the good ground , these are such as in an honest and good heart , having heard the word , hold it tightly , and bring forth fruit with patience .
42008016	" No one , when he has lit a lamp , covers it with a container , or puts it under a bed ; but puts it on a stand , that those who enter in may see the light .
42008017	For nothing is hidden , that will not be revealed ; nor anything secret , that will not be known and come to light .
42008018	Be careful therefore how you hear . For whoever has , to him will be given ; and whoever doesn't have , from him will be taken away even that which he thinks he has . "
42008019	His mother and brothers came to him , and they could not come near him for the crowd .
42008020	It was told him by some saying , " Your mother and your brothers stand outside , desiring to see you . "
42008021	But he answered them , " My mother and my brothers are these who hear the word of God , and do it . "
42008022	Now it happened on one of those days , that he entered into a boat , himself and his disciples , and he said to them , " Let's go over to the other side of the lake . " So they launched out .

42008028	When he saw Jesus , he cried out , and fell down before him , and with a loud voice said , " What do I have to do with you , Jesus , you Son of the Most High God ? I beg you , don't torment me ! "

42008035	People went out to see what had happened . They came to Jesus , and found the man from whom the demons were gone out , sitting , clothed and in his right mind , at the feet of Jesus ; and they were afraid .
42008036	Those who saw it told them how he who was possessed with demons was healed .
42008037	All the people of the surrounding country of the Gadarenes asked him to depart from them , for they were very much afraid . He entered into the boat , and returned .
42008038	But the man from whom the demons had gone out begged him that he might go with him , but Jesus sent him away , saying ,
42008039	" Return to your house , and declare what great things God has done for you . " He went his way , proclaiming throughout the whole city what great things Jesus had done for him .
42008040	It happened , as Jesus returned , the multitude welcomed him , for they were all waiting for him .
42008041	Behold , there came a man named Jairus , and he was a ruler of the synagogue . He fell down at Jesus ' feet , and begged him to come into his house ,
42008042	for he had an only daughter , about twelve years of age , and she was dying . But as he went , the multitudes thronged him .
42008043	A woman who had a flow of blood for twelve years , who had spent all her living on physicians , and could not be healed by any ,
42008044	came behind him , and touched the fringe of his cloak , and immediately the flow of her blood stopped .
42008045	Jesus said , " Who touched me ? " When all denied , Peter and those with him said , " Master , the multitudes press and jostle you , and you say , ' Who touched me ? ' "
42008046	But Jesus said , " Someone did touch me , for I perceived that power has gone out of me . "
42008047	When the woman saw that she was not hidden , she came trembling , and falling down before him declared to him in the presence of all the people the reason why she had touched him , and how she was healed immediately .
42008048	He said to her , " Daughter , cheer up . Your faith has made you well . Go in peace . "
42008049	While he still spoke , one from the ruler of the synagogue's house came , saying to him , " Your daughter is dead . Don't trouble the Teacher . "
42008050	But Jesus hearing it , answered him , " Don't be afraid . Only believe , and she will be healed . "
42008051	When he came to the house , he didn't allow anyone to enter in , except Peter , John , James , the father of the girl , and her mother .
42008052	All were weeping , and mourning her , but he said , " Don't weep . She isn't dead , but sleeping . "
42008053	They laughed him to scorn , knowing that she was dead .
42008054	But he put them all outside , and taking her by the hand , he called , saying , " Little girl , arise ! "
42008055	Her spirit returned , and she rose up immediately . He commanded that something be given to her to eat .
42008056	Her parents were amazed , but he charged them to tell no one what had been done .
42009001	He called the twelve together , and gave them power and authority over all demons , and to cure diseases .
42009002	He sent them forth to preach the kingdom of God , and to heal the sick .
42009003	He said to them , " Take nothing for your journey - - neither staffs , nor wallet , nor bread , nor money ; neither have two coats apiece .
42009004	Into whatever house you enter , stay there , and depart from there .
42009005	As many as don't receive you , when you depart from that city , shake off even the dust from your feet for a testimony against them . "
42009006	They departed , and went throughout the villages , preaching the gospel , and healing everywhere .
42009007	Now Herod , the tetrarch , heard of all that was done by him ; and he was very perplexed , because it was said by some that John had risen from the dead ,
42009008	and by some that Elijah had appeared , and by others that one of the old prophets had risen again .
42009009	Herod said , " John I beheaded , but who is this , about whom I hear such things ? " He sought to see him .
42009010	The apostles , when they had returned , told him what things they had done . He took them , and withdrew apart to a deserted place of a city called Bethsaida .
42009011	But the multitudes , perceiving it , followed him . He welcomed them , and spoke to them of the kingdom of God , and he cured those who needed healing .
42009012	The day began to wear away ; and the twelve came , and said to him , " Send the multitude away , that they may go into the surrounding villages and farms , and lodge , and get provisions , for we are here in a desert place . "
42009013	But he said to them , " You give them something to eat . " They said , " We have no more than five loaves and two fish , unless we should go and buy food for all these people . "
42009014	For they were about five thousand men . He said to his disciples , " Make them sit down in groups of about fifty each . "
42009015	They did so , and made them all sit down .
42009016	He took the five loaves and the two fish , and looking up to the sky , he blessed them , and broke them , and gave them to the disciples to set before the multitude .
42009017	They ate , and were all filled . They gathered up twelve baskets of broken pieces that were left over .
42009018	It happened , as he was praying alone , the disciples were with him , and he asked them , " Who do the multitudes say that I am ? "
42009019	They answered , " ' John the Baptizer , ' but others say , ' Elijah , ' and others , that one of the old prophets is risen again . "
42009020	He said to them , " But who do you say that I am ? " Peter answered , " The Christ of God . "
42009021	But he warned them , and commanded them to tell this to no one ,
42009022	saying , " The Son of Man must suffer many things , and be rejected by the elders , chief priests , and scribes , and be killed , and the third day be raised up . "
42009023	He said to all , " If anyone desires to come after me , let him deny himself , take up his cross , and follow me .
42009024	For whoever desires to save his life will lose it , but whoever will lose his life for my sake , the same will save it .
42009025	For what does it profit a man if he gains the whole world , and loses or forfeits his own self ?
42009026	For whoever will be ashamed of me and of my words , of him will the Son of Man be ashamed , when he comes in the glory of himself , of the Father , and of the holy angels .
42009027	But I tell you the truth : There are some of those who stand here , who will in no way taste of death , until they see the kingdom of God . "
42009028	It happened about eight days after these sayings , that he took with him Peter , John , and James , and went up onto the mountain to pray .
42009029	As he was praying , the appearance of his face was altered , and his clothing became white and dazzling .
42009030	Behold , two men talked with him , who were Moses and Elijah ,
42009031	who appeared in glory , and spoke of his departure , which he was about to accomplish at Jerusalem .
42009032	Now Peter and those who were with him were heavy with sleep , but when they were fully awake , they saw his glory , and the two men who stood with him .
42009033	It happened , as they were parting from him , that Peter said to Jesus , " Master , it is good for us to be here . Let's make three tents : one for you , and one for Moses , and one for Elijah , " not knowing what he said .
42009034	While he said these things , a cloud came and overshadowed them , and they were afraid as they entered into the cloud .
42009035	A voice came out of the cloud , saying , " This is my beloved Son . Listen to him ! "
42009036	When the voice came , Jesus was found alone . They were silent , and told no one in those days any of the things which they had seen .
42009037	It happened on the next day , when they had come down from the mountain , that a great multitude met him .
42009038	Behold , a man from the crowd called out , saying , " Teacher , I beg you to look at my son , for he is my only child .
42009039	Behold , a spirit takes him , he suddenly cries out , and it convulses him so that he foams , and it hardly departs from him , bruising him severely .
42009040	I begged your disciples to cast it out , and they couldn't . "
42009041	Jesus answered , " Faithless and perverse generation , how long will I be with you and bear with you ? Bring your son here . "
42009042	While he was still coming , the demon threw him down and convulsed him violently . But Jesus rebuked the unclean spirit , and healed the boy , and gave him back to his father .
42009043	They were all astonished at the majesty of God . But while all were marveling at all the things which Jesus did , he said to his disciples ,
42009044	" Let these words sink into your ears , for the Son of Man will be delivered up into the hands of men . "
42009045	But they didn't understand this saying . It was concealed from them , that they should not perceive it , and they were afraid to ask him about this saying .
42009046	There arose an argument among them about which of them was the greatest .
42009047	Jesus , perceiving the reasoning of their heart , took a little child , and set him by his side ,
42009048	and said to them , " Whoever receives this little child in my name receives me . Whoever receives me receives him who sent me . For whoever is least among you all , this one will be great . "
42009049	John answered , " Master , we saw someone casting out demons in your name , and we forbade him , because he doesn't follow with us . "
42009050	Jesus said to him , " Don't forbid him , for he who is not against us is for us . "
42009051	It came to pass , when the days were near that he should be taken up , he intently set his face to go to Jerusalem ,
42009052	and sent messengers before his face . They went , and entered into a village of the Samaritans , so as to prepare for him .
42009053	They didn't receive him , because he was traveling with his face set towards Jerusalem .
42009054	When his disciples , James and John , saw this , they said , " Lord , do you want us to command fire to come down from the sky , and destroy them , just as Elijah did ? "
42009055	But he turned and rebuked them , " You don't know what kind of spirit you are of .
42009056	For the Son of Man didn't come to destroy men's lives , but to save them . " They went to another village .
42009057	As they went on the way , a certain man said to him , " I want to follow you wherever you go , Lord . "
42009058	Jesus said to him , " The foxes have holes , and the birds of the sky have nests , but the Son of Man has no place to lay his head . "
42009059	He said to another , " Follow me . " But he said , " Lord , allow me first to go and bury my father . "
42009060	But Jesus said to him , " Leave the dead to bury their own dead , but you go and announce the kingdom of God . "
42009061	Another also said , " I want to follow you , Lord , but first allow me to bid farewell to those who are at my house . "
42009062	But Jesus said to him , " No one , having put his hand to the plow , and looking back , is fit for the kingdom of God . "
42010001	Now after these things the Lord also appointed seventy others , and sent them two by two before his face into every city and place , where he himself was about to come .
42010002	Then he said to them , " The harvest is indeed plentiful , but the laborers are few . Pray therefore to the Lord of the harvest , that he may send out laborers into his harvest .
42010003	Go your ways . Behold , I send you out as lambs in the midst of wolves .
42010004	Carry no purse , nor wallet , nor sandals . Greet no one on the way .
42010005	Into whatever house you enter , first say , ' Peace be to this house . '
42010006	If a son of peace is there , your peace will rest on him ; but if not , it will return to you .
42010007	Remain in that same house , eating and drinking the things they give , for the laborer is worthy of his wages . Don't go from house to house .
42010008	Into whatever city you enter , and they receive you , eat the things that are set before you .
42010009	Heal the sick who are therein , and tell them , ' The kingdom of God has come near to you . '
42010010	But into whatever city you enter , and they don't receive you , go out into the streets of it and say ,
42010011	' Even the dust from your city that clings to us , we wipe off against you . Nevertheless know this , that the kingdom of God has come near to you . '
42010012	I tell you , it will be more tolerable in that day for Sodom than for that city .
42010013	" Woe to you , Chorazin ! Woe to you , Bethsaida ! For if the mighty works had been done in Tyre and Sidon which were done in you , they would have repented long ago , sitting in sackcloth and ashes .
42010014	But it will be more tolerable for Tyre and Sidon in the judgment than for you .
42010015	You , Capernaum , who are exalted to heaven , will be brought down to Hades .
42010016	Whoever listens to you listens to me , and whoever rejects you rejects me . Whoever rejects me rejects him who sent me . "
42010017	The seventy returned with joy , saying , " Lord , even the demons are subject to us in your name . "

42010020	Nevertheless , don't rejoice in this , that the spirits are subject to you , but rejoice that your names are written in heaven . "
42010021	In that same hour Jesus rejoiced in the Holy Spirit , and said , " I thank you , O Father , Lord of heaven and earth , that you have hidden these things from the wise and understanding , and revealed them to little children . Yes , Father , for so it was well-pleasing in your sight . "
42010022	Turning to the disciples , he said , " All things have been delivered to me from my Father . No one knows who the Son is , except the Father , and who the Father is , except the Son , and he to whoever the Son desires to reveal him . "
42010023	Turning to the disciples , he said privately , " Blessed are the eyes which see the things that you see ,
42010024	for I tell you that many prophets and kings desired to see the things which you see , and didn't see them , and to hear the things which you hear , and didn't hear them . "
42010025	Behold , a certain lawyer stood up and tested him , saying , " Teacher , what will I do to inherit eternal life ? "
42010026	He said to him , " What is written in the law ? How do you read it ? "
42010027	He answered , " You shall love the Lord your God with all your heart , with all your soul , with all your strength , and with all your mind ; and your neighbor as yourself . "
42010028	He said to him , " You have answered correctly . Do this , and you will live . "
42010029	But he , desiring to justify himself , asked Jesus , " Who is my neighbor ? "
42010030	Jesus answered , " A certain man was going down from Jerusalem to Jericho , and he fell among robbers , who both stripped him and beat him , and departed , leaving him half dead .
42010031	By chance a certain priest was going down that way . When he saw him , he passed by on the other side .
42010032	In the same way a Levite also , when he came to the place , and saw him , passed by on the other side .
42010033	But a certain Samaritan , as he journeyed , came where he was . When he saw him , he was moved with compassion ,
42010034	came to him , and bound up his wounds , pouring on oil and wine . He set him on his own animal , and brought him to an inn , and took care of him .
42010035	On the next day , when he departed , he took out two denarii , and gave them to the host , and said to him , ' Take care of him . Whatever you spend beyond that , I will repay you when I return . '
42010036	Now which of these three do you think seemed to be a neighbor to him who fell among the robbers ? "
42010037	He said , " He who showed mercy on him . " Then Jesus said to him , " Go and do likewise . "
42010038	It happened as they went on their way , he entered into a certain village , and a certain woman named Martha received him into her house .
42010039	She had a sister called Mary , who also sat at Jesus ' feet , and heard his word .
42010040	But Martha was distracted with much serving , and she came up to him , and said , " Lord , don't you care that my sister left me to serve alone ? Ask her therefore to help me . "
42010041	Jesus answered her , " Martha , Martha , you are anxious and troubled about many things ,
42010042	but one thing is needed . Mary has chosen the good part , which will not be taken away from her . "
42011001	It happened , that when he finished praying in a certain place , one of his disciples said to him , " Lord , teach us to pray , just as John also taught his disciples . "
42011002	He said to them , " When you pray , say , ' Our Father in heaven , May your name be kept holy . May your kingdom come . May your desire be done on Earth , as it is in heaven .
42011003	Give us day by day our daily bread .
42011004	Forgive us our sins , for we ourselves also forgive everyone who is indebted to us . Bring us not into temptation , but deliver us from the evil one . ' "
42011005	He said to them , " Which of you , if you go to a friend at midnight , and tell him , ' Friend , lend me three loaves of bread ,
42011006	for a friend of mine has come to me from a journey , and I have nothing to set before him , '
42011007	and he from within will answer and say , ' Don't bother me . The door is now shut , and my children are with me in bed . I can't get up and give it to you ' ?
42011008	I tell you , although he will not rise and give it to him because he is his friend , yet because of his persistence , he will get up and give him as many as he needs .
42011009	I tell you , keep asking , and it will be given you . Keep seeking , and you will find . Keep knocking , and it will be opened to you .
42011010	For everyone who asks receives . He who seeks finds . To him who knocks it will be opened .
42011011	Which of you fathers , if your son asks for bread , will give him a stone ? Or if he asks for a fish , he won't give him a snake instead of a fish , will he ?
42011012	Or if he asks for an egg , he won't give him a scorpion , will he ?
42011013	If you then , being evil , know how to give good gifts to your children , how much more will your heavenly Father give the Holy Spirit to those who ask him ? "
42011014	He was casting out a demon , and it was mute . It happened , when the demon had gone out , the mute man spoke ; and the multitudes marveled .
42011015	But some of them said , " He casts out demons by Beelzebul , the prince of the demons . "
42011016	Others , testing him , sought from him a sign from heaven .
42011017	But he , knowing their thoughts , said to them , " Every kingdom divided against itself is brought to desolation . A house divided against itself falls .
42011018	If Satan also is divided against himself , how will his kingdom stand ? Because you say that I cast out demons by Beelzebul .
42011019	But if I cast out demons by Beelzebul , by whom do your sons cast them out ? Therefore will they be your judges .
42011020	But if I by the finger of God cast out demons , then is the kingdom of God come to you .
42011021	When the strong man , fully armed , guards his own dwelling , his goods are safe .
42011022	But when someone stronger comes on him , and overcomes him , he takes from him his whole armor in which he trusted , and divides his spoils .
42011023	He that is not with me is against me . He who doesn't gather with me scatters .
42011024	The unclean spirit , when he has gone out of the man , passes through dry places , seeking rest , and finding none , he says , ' I will turn back to my house whence I came out . '
42011025	When he returns , he finds it swept and put in order .
42011026	Then he goes , and takes seven other spirits more evil than himself , and they enter in and dwell there . The last state of that man becomes worse than the first . "
42011027	It came to pass , as he said these things , a certain woman out of the multitude lifted up her voice , and said to him , " Blessed is the womb that bore you , and the breasts which nursed you ! "
42011028	But he said , " On the contrary , blessed are those who hear the word of God , and keep it . "
42011029	When the multitudes were gathering together to him , he began to say , " This is an evil generation . It seeks after a sign . No sign will be given to it but the sign of Jonah , the prophet .
42011030	For even as Jonah became a sign to the Ninevites , so will also the Son of Man be to this generation .
42011031	The Queen of the South will rise up in the judgment with the men of this generation , and will condemn them : for she came from the ends of the earth to hear the wisdom of Solomon ; and behold , one greater than Solomon is here .
42011032	The men of Nineveh will stand up in the judgment with this generation , and will condemn it : for they repented at the preaching of Jonah , and behold , one greater than Jonah is here .
42011033	No man , when he has lit a lamp , puts it in a cellar , nor under a basket , but on the stand , that they which enter in may see the light .
42011034	The lamp of the body is the eye . Therefore when your eye is good , your whole body also is full of light ; but when it is evil , your body also is full of darkness .
42011035	Therefore see whether the light that is in you isn't darkness .
42011036	If therefore your whole body is full of light , having no part dark , it will be wholly full of light , as when the lamp with its bright shining gives you light . "
42011037	Now as he spoke , a certain Pharisee asked him to dine with him . He went in , and sat at the table .
42011038	When the Pharisee saw it , he marveled that he had not first washed himself before dinner .
42011039	The Lord said to him , " Now you Pharisees cleanse the outside of the cup and of the platter , but your inward part is full of extortion and wickedness .
42011040	You foolish ones , didn't he who made the outside make the inside also ?
42011041	But give for alms those things which are within , and behold , all things will be clean to you .
42011042	But woe to you Pharisees ! For you tithe mint and rue and every herb , and bypass justice and the love of God . You ought to have done these , and not to leave the other undone .
42011043	Woe to you Pharisees ! For you love the best seats in the synagogues , and the greetings in the marketplaces .
42011044	Woe to you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! For you are like hidden graves , and the men who walk over them don't know it . "
42011045	One of the lawyers answered him , " Teacher , in saying this you insult us also . "
42011046	He said , " Woe to you lawyers also ! For you load men with burdens that are difficult to carry , and you yourselves won't even lift one finger to help carry those burdens .
42011047	Woe to you ! For you build the tombs of the prophets , and your fathers killed them .
42011048	So you testify and consent to the works of your fathers . For they killed them , and you build their tombs .
42011049	Therefore also the wisdom of God said , ' I will send to them prophets and apostles ; and some of them they will kill and persecute ,
42011050	that the blood of all the prophets , which was shed from the foundation of the world , may be required of this generation ;
42011051	from the blood of Abel to the blood of Zachariah , who perished between the altar and the sanctuary . ' Yes , I tell you , it will be required of this generation .
42011052	Woe to you lawyers ! For you took away the key of knowledge . You didn't enter in yourselves , and those who were entering in , you hindered . "
42011053	As he said these things to them , the scribes and the Pharisees began to be terribly angry , and to draw many things out of him ;
42011054	laying in wait for him , and seeking to catch him in something he might say , that they might accuse him .
42012001	Meanwhile , when a multitude of many thousands had gathered together , so much so that they trampled on each other , he began to tell his disciples first of all , " Beware of the yeast of the Pharisees , which is hypocrisy .
42012002	But there is nothing covered up , that will not be revealed , nor hidden , that will not be known .
42012003	Therefore whatever you have said in the darkness will be heard in the light . What you have spoken in the ear in the inner chambers will be proclaimed on the housetops .
42012004	I tell you , my friends , don't be afraid of those who kill the body , and after that have no more that they can do .
42012005	But I will warn you whom you shall fear . Fear him , who after he has killed , has power to cast into Gehenna . Yes , I tell you , fear him .
42012006	Aren't five sparrows sold for two assaria ? Not one of them is forgotten by God .
42012007	But the very hairs of your head are all numbered . Therefore don't be afraid . You are of more value than many sparrows .
42012008	I tell you , everyone who confesses me before men , him will the Son of Man also confess before the angels of God ;
42012009	but he who denies me in the presence of men will be denied in the presence of the angels of God .
42012010	Everyone who speaks a word against the Son of Man will be forgiven , but those who blaspheme against the Holy Spirit will not be forgiven .
42012011	When they bring you before the synagogues , the rulers , and the authorities , don't be anxious how or what you will answer , or what you will say ;
42012012	for the Holy Spirit will teach you in that same hour what you must say . "
42012013	One of the multitude said to him , " Teacher , tell my brother to divide the inheritance with me . "
42012014	But he said to him , " Man , who made me a judge or an arbitrator over you ? "
42012015	He said to them , " Beware ! Keep yourselves from covetousness , for a man's life doesn't consist of the abundance of the things which he possesses . "
42012016	He spoke a parable to them , saying , " The ground of a certain rich man brought forth abundantly .
42012017	He reasoned within himself , saying , ' What will I do , because I don't have room to store my crops ? '
42012018	He said , ' This is what I will do . I will pull down my barns , and build bigger ones , and there I will store all my grain and my goods .
42012019	I will tell my soul , " Soul , you have many goods laid up for many years . Take your ease , eat , drink , be merry . " '
42012020	But God said to him , ' You foolish one , tonight your soul is required of you . The things which you have prepared - - whose will they be ? '
42012021	So is he who lays up treasure for himself , and is not rich toward God . "
42012022	He said to his disciples , " Therefore I tell you , don't be anxious for your life , what you will eat , nor yet for your body , what you will wear .
42012023	Life is more than food , and the body than clothing .
42012024	Consider the ravens : they don't sow , they don't reap , they have no warehouse or barn , and God feeds them . How much more valuable are you than birds !
42012025	Which of you by being anxious can add a cubit to his height ?
42012026	If then you aren't able to do even the least things , why are you anxious about the rest ?
42012027	Consider the lilies , how they grow . They don't toil , neither do they spin ; yet I tell you , even Solomon in all his glory was not arrayed like one of these .
42012028	But if this is how God clothes the grass in the field , which today exists , and tomorrow is cast into the oven , how much more will he clothe you , you of little faith ?
42012029	Don't seek what you will eat or what you will drink ; neither be anxious .
42012030	For the nations of the world seek after all of these things , but your Father knows that you need these things .
42012031	Yet seek God's kingdom , and all these things will be added to you .
42012032	Don't be afraid , little flock , for it is your Father's good pleasure to give you the kingdom .
42012033	Sell that which you have , and give alms . Make for yourselves purses which don't grow old , a treasure in the heavens that doesn't fail , where no thief approaches , neither moth destroys .
42012034	For where your treasure is , there will your heart be also .
42012035	Let your loins be girded about , and your lamps burning .
42012036	Be like men looking for their lord , when he will return from the marriage feast ; that , when he comes and knocks , they may immediately open to him .
42012037	Blessed are those servants , whom the lord will find watching when he comes . Most assuredly I tell you , that he will gird himself , and make them recline , and will come and serve them .
42012038	They will be blessed if he comes in the second or third watch , and finds them so .
42012039	But know this , that if the master of the house had known in what hour the thief was coming , he would have watched , and not allowed his house to be broken into .
42012040	Therefore be ready also , for the Son of Man is coming in an hour that you don't expect him . "
42012041	Peter said to him , " Lord , are you telling this parable to us , or to everybody ? "
42012042	The Lord said , " Who then is the faithful and wise steward , whom his lord will set over his household , to give them their portion of food at the right times ?
42012043	Blessed is that servant whom his lord will find doing so when he comes .
42012044	Truly I tell you , that he will set him over all that he has .
42012045	But if that servant says in his heart , ' My lord delays his coming , ' and begins to beat the menservants and the maidservants , and to eat and drink , and to be drunken ,
42012046	then the lord of that servant will come in a day when he isn't expecting him , and in an hour that he doesn't know , and will cut him apart , and place his portion with the unfaithful .
42012047	That servant , who knew his lord's will , and didn't prepare , nor do what he wanted , will be beaten with many stripes ,

42019011	As they heard these things , he went on and told a parable , because he was near Jerusalem , and they supposed that the kingdom of God would be revealed immediately .
42019012	He said therefore , " A certain nobleman went into a far country to receive for himself a kingdom , and to return .
42019013	He called ten servants of his , and gave them ten minas , and told them , ' Conduct business until I come . '
42019014	But his citizens hated him , and sent an envoy after him , saying , ' We don't want this man to reign over us . '

42019016	The first came before him , saying , ' Lord , your mina has made ten more minas . '

42019023	Then why didn't you deposit my money in the bank , and I at my coming might have earned interest on it ? '

42019025	They said to him , ' Lord , he has ten minas ! '
42019026	' For I tell you that to everyone who has , will more be given ; but from him who doesn't have , even that which he has will be taken away from him .

42019028	When he had thus spoken , he went on ahead , going up to Jerusalem .

42019032	Those who were sent went away , and found things just as he had told them .

42019036	As he went , they spread their cloaks in the way .

42019038	saying , " Blessed is the King who comes in the name of the Lord ! Peace in heaven , and glory in the highest ! "

42019042	saying , " If you , even you , had known today the things which belong to your peace ! But now , they are hidden from your eyes .

42020001	It happened on one of those days , as he was teaching the people in the temple and preaching the gospel , that the chief priests and scribes came to him with the elders .
42020002	They asked him , " Tell us : by what authority do you do these things ? Or who is giving you this authority ? "
42020003	He answered them , " I also will ask you one question . Tell me :
42020004	the baptism of John , was it from heaven , or from men ? "
42020005	They reasoned with themselves , saying , " If we say , ' From heaven , ' he will say , ' Why didn't you believe him ? '
42020006	But if we say , ' From men , ' all the people will stone us , for they are persuaded that John was a prophet . "
42020007	They answered that they didn't know where it was from .
42020008	Jesus said to them , " Neither will I tell you by what authority I do these things . "
42020009	He began to tell the people this parable . " A man planted a vineyard , and rented it out to some farmers , and went into another country for a long time .
42020010	At the proper season , he sent a servant to the farmers to collect his share of the fruit of the vineyard . But the farmers beat him , and sent him away empty .
42020011	He sent yet another servant , and they also beat him , and treated him shamefully , and sent him away empty .
42020012	He sent yet a third , and they also wounded him , and threw him out .
42020013	The lord of the vineyard said , ' What will I do ? I will send my beloved son . It may be that seeing him , they will respect him . '
42020014	But when the farmers saw him , they reasoned among themselves , saying , ' This is the heir . Come , let's kill him , that the inheritance may be ours . '
42020015	They threw him out of the vineyard , and killed him . What therefore will the lord of the vineyard do to them ?
42020016	He will come and destroy these farmers , and will give the vineyard to others . " When they heard it , they said , " God forbid ! "
42020017	But he looked at them , and said , " Then what is this that is written , ' The stone which the builders rejected , The same was made the chief cornerstone ? '
42020018	" Everyone who falls on that stone will be broken to pieces , but it will crush whoever it falls on to dust . "

42020021	They asked him , " Teacher , we know that you say and teach what is right , and aren't partial to anyone , but truly teach the way of God .

42020023	But he perceived their slyness , and said to them , " Why do you test me ?

42020025	He said to them , " Then give to Caesar the things that are Caesar's , and to God the things that are God's . "
42020026	They weren't able to trap him in his words before the people . They marveled at his answer , and were silent .
42020027	Some of the Sadducees came to him , those who deny that there is a resurrection .
42020028	They asked him , " Teacher , Moses wrote to us that if a man's brother dies having a wife , and he is childless , his brother should take the wife , and raise up children for his brother .
42020029	There were therefore seven brothers . The first took a wife , and died childless .
42020030	The second took her as wife , and he died childless .
42020031	The third took her , and likewise the seven all left no children , and died .
42020032	Afterward the woman also died .
42020033	Therefore in the resurrection whose wife of them will she be ? For the seven had her as a wife . "
42020034	Jesus said to them , " The sons of this age marry , and are given in marriage .
42020035	But those who are considered worthy to attain to that age and the resurrection from the dead , neither marry , nor are given in marriage .
42020036	For neither can they die any more , for they are like the angels , and are sons of God , being sons of the resurrection .
42020037	But that the dead are raised , even Moses showed at the bush , when he called the Lord ' The God of Abraham , the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob . '
42020038	Now he is not the God of the dead , but of the living , for all are alive to him . "
42020039	Some of the scribes answered , " Teacher , you speak well . "
42020040	They didn't dare to ask him any more questions .

42020043	Until I make your enemies the footstool of your feet . " '
42020044	" David therefore calls him Lord , so how is he his son ? "
42020045	In the hearing of all the people , he said to his disciples ,
42020046	" Beware of the scribes , who desire to walk in long robes , and love greetings in the marketplaces , the best seats in the synagogues , and the best places at feasts ;
42020047	who devour widows ' houses , and for a pretense make long prayers : these will receive greater condemnation . "
42021001	He looked up , and saw the rich people who were putting their gifts into the treasury .
