42024011	These words seemed to them to be nonsense , and they didn't believe them .
42024012	But Peter got up and ran to the tomb . Stooping and looking in , he saw the strips of linen lying by themselves , and he departed to his home , wondering what had happened .
42024013	Behold , two of them were going that very day to a village named Emmaus , which was sixty stadia from Jerusalem .
42024014	They talked with each other about all of these things which had happened .
42024015	It happened , while they talked and questioned together , that Jesus himself came near , and went with them .
42024016	But their eyes were kept from recognizing him .
42024017	He said to them , " What are you talking about as you walk , and are sad ? "
42024018	One of them , named Cleopas , answered him , " Are you the only one travelling in Jerusalem who doesn't know the things which have happened there in these days ? "
42024019	He said to them , " What things ? " They said to him , " The things concerning Jesus , the Nazarene , who was a prophet mighty in deed and word before God and all the people ;
42024020	and how the chief priests and our rulers delivered him up to be condemned to death , and crucified him .
42024021	But we hoped that it was he who would redeem Israel . Yes , and besides all this , it is now the third day since these things happened .
42024022	Also , certain women of our company amazed us , having been early at the tomb ;
42024023	and when they didn't find his body , they came saying that they had also seen a vision of angels , who said that he was alive .
42024024	Some of us went to the tomb , and found it just like the women had said , but they didn't see him . "
42024025	He said to them , " Foolish men , and slow of heart to believe in all that the prophets have spoken !
42024026	Didn't the Christ have to suffer these things , and to enter into his glory ? "
42024027	Beginning from Moses and from all the prophets , he interpreted to them in all the scriptures the things concerning himself .
42024028	They drew near to the village , where they were going , and he acted like he would go further .
42024029	They urged him , saying , " Stay with us , for it is almost evening , and the day is almost over . " He went in to stay with them .
42024030	It happened , when he had sat down at the table with them , he took the bread and gave thanks . Breaking it , he gave to them .
42024031	Their eyes were opened , and they recognized him , and he vanished out of their sight .
42024032	They said one to another , " Wasn't our heart burning within us , while he spoke to us along the way , and while he opened the scriptures to us ? "
42024033	They rose up that very hour , and returned to Jerusalem , and found the eleven gathered together , and those who were with them ,
42024034	saying , " The Lord is risen indeed , and has appeared to Simon ! "
42024035	They related the things that happened along the way , and how he was recognized by them in the breaking of the bread .
42024036	As they said these things , Jesus himself stood in the midst of them , and said to them , " Peace be to you . "
42024037	But they were terrified and filled with fear , and supposed that they saw a spirit .
42024038	He said to them , " Why are you troubled ? Why do questionings arise in your hearts ?
42024039	See my hands and my feet , that it is I myself . Touch me and see , for a spirit doesn't have flesh and bones , as you see that I have . "
42024040	When he had said this , he showed them his hands and his feet .
42024041	While they still didn't believe for joy , and wondered , he said to them , " Do you have anything here to eat ? "
42024042	They gave him a piece of a broiled fish and some honeycomb .
42024043	He took it , and ate in front of them .
42024044	He said to them , " This is what I told you , while I was still with you , that all things must be fulfilled , which are written in the law of Moses , the prophets , and the psalms , concerning me . "
42024045	Then he opened their minds , that they might understand the scriptures .
42024046	He said to them , " Thus it is written , and thus it was necessary for the Christ to suffer and to rise from the dead the third day ,
42024047	and that repentance and remission of sins should be preached in his name to all the nations , beginning at Jerusalem .
42024048	You are witnesses of these things .
42024049	Behold , I send forth the promise of my Father on you . But wait in the city of Jerusalem until you are clothed with power from on high . "
42024050	He led them out as far as to Bethany , and he lifted up his hands , and blessed them .
42024051	It happened , while he blessed them , that he withdrew from them , and was carried up into heaven .
42024052	They worshipped him , and returned to Jerusalem with great joy ,
42024053	and were continually in the temple , praising and blessing God . Amen .
43001001	In the beginning was the Word , and the Word was with God , and the Word was God .
43001002	The same was in the beginning with God .
43001003	All things were made through him . Without him was not anything made that has been made .
43001004	In him was life , and the life was the light of men .
43001005	The light shines in the darkness , and the darkness hasn't overcome it .
43001006	There came a man , sent from God , whose name was John .
43001007	The same came as a witness , that he might testify about the light , that all might believe through him .
43001008	He was not the light , but was sent that he might testify about the light .
43001009	The true light that enlightens everyone was coming into the world .
43001010	He was in the world , and the world was made through him , and the world didn't recognize him .
43001011	He came to his own , and those who were his own didn't receive him .
43001012	But as many as received him , to them he gave the right to become God's children , to those who believe in his name :
43001013	who were born , not of blood , nor of the will of the flesh , nor of the will of man , but of God .
43001014	The Word became flesh , and lived among us . We saw his glory , such glory as of the only Son of the Father , full of grace and truth .
43001015	John testified about him . He cried out , saying , " This was he of whom I said , ' He who comes after me has surpassed me , for he was before me . ' "
43001016	From his fullness we all received grace upon grace .
43001017	For the law was given through Moses . Grace and truth came through Jesus Christ .
43001018	No one has seen God at any time . The only conceived Son , who is in the bosom of the Father , he has declared him .
43001019	This is John's testimony , when the Jews sent priests and Levites from Jerusalem to ask him , " Who are you ? "
43001020	He confessed , and didn't deny , but he confessed , " I am not the Christ . "
43001021	They asked him , " What then ? Are you Elijah ? " He said , " I am not . " " Are you the prophet ? " He answered , " No . "
43001022	They said therefore to him , " Who are you ? Give us an answer to take back to those who sent us . What do you say about yourself ? "
43001023	He said , " I am the voice of one crying in the wilderness , ' Make straight the way of the Lord , ' as Isaiah the prophet said . "
43001024	The ones who had been sent were from the Pharisees .
43001025	They asked him , " Why then do you baptize , if you are not the Christ , nor Elijah , nor the Prophet ? "
43001026	John answered them , " I baptize in water , but among you stands one whom you don't know ,
43001027	he who comes after me , whose sandal strap I'm not worthy to untie . "
43001028	These things were done in Bethany beyond the Jordan , where John was baptizing .
43001029	On the next day , he saw Jesus coming to him , and said , " Behold , the Lamb of God , who takes away the sin of the world !
43001030	This is he of whom I said , ' After me comes a man who is preferred before me , for he was before me . '
43001031	I didn't know him , but for this reason I came baptizing in water : that he would be revealed to Israel . "
43001032	John testified , saying , " I have seen the Spirit descending like a dove out of heaven , and it remained on him .
43001033	I didn't recognize him , but he who sent me to baptize in water , he said to me , ' On whoever you will see the Spirit descending , and remaining on him , the same is he who baptizes in the Holy Spirit . '
43001034	I have seen , and have testified that this is the Son of God . "
43001035	Again , on the next day , John was standing with two of his disciples ,
43001036	and he looked at Jesus as he walked , and said , " Behold , the Lamb of God ! "
43001037	The two disciples heard him speak , and they followed Jesus .
43001038	Jesus turned , and saw them following , and said to them , " What are you looking for ? " They said to him , " Rabbi " ( which is to say , being interpreted , Teacher ) , " where are you staying ? "
43001039	He said to them , " Come , and see . " They came and saw where he was staying , and they stayed with him that day . It was about the tenth hour .
43001040	One of the two who heard John , and followed him , was Andrew , Simon Peter's brother .
43001041	He first found his own brother , Simon , and said to him , " We have found the Messiah ! " ( which is , being interpreted , Christ ) .
43001042	He brought him to Jesus . Jesus looked at him , and said , " You are Simon the son of Jonah . You shall be called Cephas " ( which is by interpretation , Peter ) .
43001043	On the next day , he was determined to go forth into Galilee , and he found Philip . Jesus said to him , " Follow me . "
43001044	Now Philip was from Bethsaida , of the city of Andrew and Peter .
43001045	Philip found Nathanael , and said to him , " We have found him , of whom Moses in the law , and the prophets , wrote : Jesus of Nazareth , the son of Joseph . "
43001046	Nathanael said to him , " Can any good thing come out of Nazareth ? " Philip said to him , " Come and see . "
43001047	Jesus saw Nathanael coming to him , and said about him , " Behold , an Israelite indeed , in whom is no deceit ! "
43001048	Nathanael says to him , " How do you know me ? " Jesus answered him , " Before Philip called you , when you were under the fig tree , I saw you . "
43001049	Nathanael answered him , " Rabbi , you are the Son of God ! You are King of Israel ! "
43001050	Jesus answered him , " Because I told you , ' I saw you underneath the fig tree , ' do you believe ? You will see greater things than these . "
43001051	He said to him , " Most assuredly , I tell you , hereafter you will see heaven opened , and the angels of God ascending and descending on the Son of Man . "
43002001	The third day , there was a marriage in Cana of Galilee . Jesus ' mother was there .
43002002	Jesus also was invited , with his disciples , to the marriage .
43002003	When the wine ran out , Jesus ' Mother said to him , " They have no wine . "
43002004	Jesus said to her , " Woman , what does that have to do with you and me ? My hour has not yet come . "
43002005	His mother said to the servants , " Whatever he says to you , do it . "
43002006	Now there were six water pots of stone set there after the Jews ' manner of purifying , containing two or three metretes apiece .
43002007	Jesus said to them , " Fill the water pots with water . " They filled them up to the brim .
43002008	He said to them , " Now draw some out , and take it to the ruler of the feast . " They took it .
43002009	When the ruler of the feast tasted the water now become wine , and didn't know where it came from ( but the servants who had drawn the water knew ) , the ruler of the feast called the bridegroom ,
43002010	and said to him , " Everyone serves the good wine first , and when the guests have drunk freely , then that which is worse . You have kept the good wine until now ! "
43002011	This beginning of his signs Jesus did in Cana of Galilee , and revealed his glory . His disciples believed in him .
43002012	After this , he went down to Capernaum , he , and his mother , his brothers , and his disciples ; and there they stayed not many days .
43002013	The Passover of the Jews was at hand , and Jesus went up to Jerusalem .
43002014	He found in the temple those who sold oxen , sheep , and doves , and the changers of money sitting .
43002015	He made a whip of cords , and threw all out of the temple , both the sheep and the oxen ; and he poured out the changers ' money , and overthrew their tables .
43002016	To those who sold the doves , he said , " Take these things out of here ! Don't make my Father's house a marketplace ! "
43002017	His disciples remembered that it was written , " Zeal for your house will eat me up . "
43002018	The Jews therefore answered him , " What sign do you show to us , seeing that you do these things ? "
43002019	Jesus answered them , " Destroy this temple , and in three days I will raise it up . "
43002020	The Jews therefore said , " Forty-six years was this temple in building , and will you raise it up in three days ? "
43002021	But he spoke of the temple of his body .
43002022	When therefore he was raised from the dead , his disciples remembered that he said this , and they believed the scripture , and the word which Jesus had said .
43002023	Now when he was in Jerusalem at the Passover , during the feast , many believed in his name , observing his signs which he did .
43002024	But Jesus didn't trust himself to them , because he knew all people ,
43002025	and because he didn't need for anyone to testify concerning man ; for he himself knew what was in man .
43003001	Now there was a man of the Pharisees named Nicodemus , a ruler of the Jews .
43003002	The same came to him by night , and said to him , " Rabbi , we know that you are a teacher come from God , for no one can do these signs that you do , unless God is with him . "
43003003	Jesus answered him , " Most assuredly , I tell you , unless one is born anew , he can't see the kingdom of God . "
43003004	Nicodemus said to him , " How can a man be born when he is old ? Can he enter a second time into his mother's womb , and be born ? "
43003005	Jesus answered , " Most assuredly I tell you , unless one is born of water and the Spirit , he can't enter into the kingdom of God !
43003006	That which is born of the flesh is flesh . That which is born of the Spirit is spirit .
43003007	Don't marvel that I said to you , ' You must be born anew . '
43003008	The wind blows where it wants to , and you hear its sound , but don't know where it comes from and where it is going . So is everyone who is born of the Spirit . "
43003009	Nicodemus answered him , " How can these things be ? "
43003010	Jesus answered him , " Are you the teacher of Israel , and don't understand these things ?
43003011	Most assuredly I tell you , we speak that which we know , and testify of that which we have seen , and you don't receive our witness .
43003012	If I told you earthly things and you don't believe , how will you believe if I tell you heavenly things ?
43003013	No one has ascended into heaven , but he who descended out of heaven , the Son of Man , who is in heaven .
43003014	As Moses lifted up the serpent in the wilderness , even so must the Son of Man be lifted up ,
43003015	that whoever believes in him should not perish , but have eternal life .
43003016	For God so loved the world , that he gave his one and only Son , that whoever believes in him should not perish , but have eternal life .
43003017	For God didn't send his Son into the world to judge the world , but that the world should be saved through him .
43003018	He who believes in him is not judged . He who doesn't believe has been judged already , because he has not believed in the name of the only born Son of God .
43003019	This is the judgment , that the light has come into the world , and men loved the darkness rather than the light ; for their works were evil .
43003020	For everyone who does evil hates the light , and doesn't come to the light , for fear that his works would be reproved .
43003021	But he who does the truth comes to the light , that his works may be revealed , that they have been done with God . "
43003022	After these things , Jesus came with his disciples into the land of Judea . He stayed there with them , and baptized .
43003023	John also was baptizing in Enon near Salim , because there was much water there . They came , and were baptized .
43003024	For John was not yet thrown into prison .
43003025	There arose therefore a questioning on the part of John's disciples with some Jews about purification .
43003026	They came to John , and said to him , " Rabbi , he who was with you beyond the Jordan , to whom you have testified , behold , the same baptizes , and all men come to him . "
43003027	John answered , " A man can receive nothing , unless it has been given him from heaven .
43003028	You yourselves testify about me , that I said , ' I am not the Christ , ' but , ' I have been sent before him . '
43003029	He who has the bride is the bridegroom ; but the friend of the bridegroom , who stands and hears him , rejoices greatly because of the bridegroom's voice . This , my joy , therefore is made full .
43003030	He must increase , but I must decrease .
43003031	He who comes from above is above all . He who is from the Earth belongs to the Earth , and speaks of the Earth . He who comes from heaven is above all .
43003032	What he has seen and heard , of that he testifies ; and no one receives his witness .
43003033	He who has received his witness has set his seal to this , that God is true .
43003034	For he whom God has sent speaks the words of God ; for God gives the Spirit without measure .
43003035	The Father loves the Son , and has given all things into his hand .
43003036	He who believes in the Son has eternal life , but he who disobeys the Son won't see life , but the wrath of God remains on him . "
43004001	Therefore when the Lord knew that the Pharisees had heard that Jesus was making and baptizing more disciples than John
43004002	( although Jesus himself didn't baptize , but his disciples ) ,
43004003	he left Judea , and departed again into Galilee .
43004004	He needed to pass through Samaria .
43004005	So he came to a city of Samaria , called Sychar , near the parcel of ground that Jacob gave to his son , Joseph .
43004006	Jacob's well was there . Jesus therefore , being tired from his journey , sat down by the well . It was about the sixth hour .
43004007	A woman of Samaria came to draw water . Jesus said to her , " Give me a drink . "
43004008	For his disciples had gone away into the city to buy food .
43004009	The Samaritan woman therefore said to him , " How is it that you , being a Jew , ask for a drink from me , a Samaritan woman ? " ( For Jews have no dealings with Samaritans . )
43004010	Jesus answered her , " If you knew the gift of God , and who it is who says to you , ' Give me a drink , ' you would have asked him , and he would have given you living water . "
43004011	The woman said to him , " Sir , you have nothing to draw with , and the well is deep . From where then have you that living water ?
43004012	Are you greater than our father , Jacob , who gave us the well , and drank of it himself , as did his sons , and his cattle ? "
43004013	Jesus answered her , " Everyone who drinks of this water will thirst again ,
43004014	but whoever drinks of the water that I will give him will never thirst ; but the water that I will give him will become in him a well of water springing up to eternal life . "
43004015	The woman said to him , " Sir , give me this water , so that I don't get thirsty , neither come all the way here to draw . "
43004016	Jesus said to her , " Go , call your husband , and come here . "
43004017	The woman answered , " I have no husband . " Jesus said to her , " You said well , ' I have no husband , '
43004018	for you have had five husbands ; and he whom you now have is not your husband . This you have said truly . "
43004019	The woman said to him , " Sir , I perceive that you are a prophet .
43004020	Our fathers worshipped in this mountain , and you Jews say that in Jerusalem is the place where people ought to worship . "
43004021	Jesus said to her , " Woman , believe me , the hour comes , when neither in this mountain , nor in Jerusalem , will you worship the Father .
43004022	You worship that which you don't know . We worship that which we know ; for salvation is from the Jews .
43004023	But the hour comes , and now is , when the true worshippers will worship the Father in spirit and truth , for the Father seeks such to be his worshippers .
43004024	God is a Spirit , and those who worship him must worship in spirit and truth . "
43004025	The woman said to him , " I know that Messiah comes , " ( he who is called Christ ) . " When he has come , he will declare to us all things . "
43004026	Jesus said to her , " I who speak to you am he . "
43004027	At this , his disciples came . They marveled that he was speaking with a woman ; yet no one said , " What are you looking for ? " or , " Why do you speak with her ? "
43004028	So the woman left her water pot , and went away into the city , and said to the people ,
43004029	" Come , see a man who told me everything that I did . Can this be the Christ ? "
43004030	They went out of the city , and were coming to him .
43004031	In the meanwhile , the disciples urged him , saying , " Rabbi , eat . "
43004032	But he said to them , " I have food to eat that you don't know about . "
43004033	The disciples therefore said one to another , " Has anyone brought him something to eat ? "
43004034	Jesus said to them , " My food is to do the will of him who sent me , and to accomplish his work .
43004035	Don't you say , ' There are yet four months until the harvest ? ' Behold , I tell you , lift up your eyes , and look at the fields , that they are white already to harvest .
43004036	He who reaps receives wages , and gathers fruit to eternal life ; that both he who sows and he who reaps may rejoice together .
43004037	For in this the saying is true , ' One sows , and another reaps . '
43004038	I sent you to reap that for which you haven't labored . Others have labored , and you have entered into their labor . "
43004039	From that city many of the Samaritans believed in him because of the word of the woman , who testified , ' He told me everything that I did . "

43004043	After the two days he went forth from there and went into Galilee .
43004044	For Jesus himself testified that a prophet has no honor in his own country .
43004045	So when he came into Galilee , the Galilaeans received him , having seen all the things that he did in Jerusalem at the feast , for they also went to the feast .
43004046	He came therefore again to Cana of Galilee , where he made the water into wine . There was a certain nobleman whose son was sick at Capernaum .
43004047	When he heard that Jesus had come out of Judea into Galilee , he went to him , and begged him that he would come down and heal his son , for he was at the point of death .
43004048	Jesus therefore said to him , " Unless you see signs and wonders , you will in no way believe . "
43004049	The nobleman said to him , " Sir , come down before my child dies . "
43004050	Jesus said to him , " Go your way . Your son lives . " The man believed the word that Jesus spoke to him , and he went his way .
43004051	As he was now going down , his servants met him and reported , saying " your child lives ! "
43004052	So he inquired of them the hour when he began to get better . They said therefore to him , " Yesterday at the seventh hour , the fever left him . "
43004053	So the father knew that it was at that hour in which Jesus said to him , " Your son lives . " He believed , as did his whole house .
43004054	This is again the second sign that Jesus did , having come out of Judea into Galilee .
43005001	After these things , there was a feast of the Jews , and Jesus went up to Jerusalem .
43005002	Now in Jerusalem by the sheep gate , there is a pool , which is called in Hebrew , " Bethesda , " having five porches .
43005003	In these lay a great multitude of those who were sick , blind , lame , or paralyzed , waiting for the moving of the water ;
43005004	for an angel of the Lord went down at certain times into the pool , and stirred up the water . Whoever stepped in first after the stirring of the water was made whole of whatever disease he was afflicted with .
43005005	A certain man was there , who had been sick for thirty-eight years .
43005006	When Jesus saw him lying there , and knew that he had been sick for a long time , he asked him , " Do you want to be made well ? "
43005007	The sick man answered him , " Sir , I have no one to put me into the pool when the water is stirred up , but while I'm coming , another steps down before me . "
43005008	Jesus said to him , " Arise , take up your mat , and walk . "
43005009	Immediately , the man was made well , and took up his mat and walked . Now it was the Sabbath on that day .
43005010	So the Jews said to him who was cured , " It is the Sabbath . It is not lawful for you to carry your mat . "
43005011	He answered them , " He who made me well , the same said to me , ' Take up your mat , and walk . ' "
43005012	Then they asked him , " Who is the man who said to you , ' Take up your mat , and walk ' ? "
43005013	But he who was healed didn't know who it was , for Jesus had withdrawn , a crowd being in the place .
43005014	Afterward Jesus found him in the temple , and said to him , " Behold , you are made well . Sin no more , so that nothing worse happens to you . "
43005015	The man went away , and told the Jews that it was Jesus who had made him well .
43005016	For this cause the Jews persecuted Jesus , and sought to kill him , because he did these things on the Sabbath .
43005017	But Jesus answered them , " My Father is still working , so I am working , too . "
43005018	For this cause therefore the Jews sought the more to kill him , because he not only broke the Sabbath , but also called God his own Father , making himself equal with God .
43005019	Jesus therefore answered them , " Most assuredly , I tell you , the Son can do nothing of himself , but what he sees the Father doing . For whatever things he does , these the Son also does likewise .
43005020	For the Father loves the Son , and shows him all things that he himself does . He will show him greater works than these , that you may marvel .
43005021	For as the Father raises the dead and gives them life , even so the Son also gives life to whom he desires .
43005022	For neither does the Father judge any man , but he has given all judgment to the Son ,
43005023	that all may honor the Son , even as they honor the Father . He who doesn't honor the Son doesn't honor the Father who sent him .
43005024	Most assuredly I tell you , he who hears my word , and believes him who sent me , has eternal life , and doesn't come into judgment , but has passed out of death into life .
43005025	Most assuredly , I tell you , the hour comes , and now is , when the dead will hear the Son of God's voice ; and those who hear will live .
43005026	For as the Father has life in himself , even so he gave to the Son also to have life in himself .
43005027	He also gave him authority to execute judgment , because he is a son of man .
43005028	Don't marvel at this , for the hour comes , in which all that are in the tombs will hear his voice ,
43005029	and will come forth ; those who have done good , to the resurrection of life ; and those who have done evil , to the resurrection of judgment .
43005030	I can of myself do nothing . As I hear , I judge , and my judgment is righteous ; because I don't seek my own will , but the will of my Father who sent me .
43005031	" If I testify about myself , my witness is not valid .
43005032	It is another who testifies about me . I know that the testimony which he testifies about me is true .
43005033	You have sent to John , and he has testified to the truth .
43005034	But the testimony which I receive is not from man . However , I say these things that you may be saved .
43005035	He was the lamp that burns and shines , and you were willing to rejoice for a while in his light .
43005036	But the testimony which I have is greater than that of John , for the works which the Father has given me to accomplish , the very works that I do , testify about me , that the Father has sent me .
43005037	The Father himself , who sent me , has testified about me . You have neither heard his voice at any time , nor seen his form .
43005038	You don't have his word living in you ; for whom he sent , him you don't believe .
43005039	You search the scriptures , because you think that in them you have eternal life ; and these are they which testify about me .
43005040	Yet you will not come to me , that you may have life .
43005041	I don't receive glory from men .
43005042	But I know you , that you don't have God's love in yourselves .
43005043	I have come in my Father's name , and you don't receive me . If another comes in his own name , you will receive him .
43005044	How can you believe , who receive glory from one another , and you don't seek the glory that comes from the only God ?
43005045	" Don't think that I will accuse you to the Father . There is one who accuses you , even Moses , on whom you have set your hope .
43005046	For if you believed Moses , you would believe me ; for he wrote about me .
43005047	But if you don't believe his writings , how will you believe my words ? "
43006001	After these things , Jesus went away to the other side of the sea of Galilee , which is also called the Sea of Tiberias .
43006002	A great multitude followed him , because they saw the signs which he did on those who were sick .
43006003	Jesus went up into the mountain , and he sat there with his disciples .
43006004	Now the Passover , the feast of the Jews , was at hand .
43006005	Jesus therefore lifting up his eyes , and seeing that a great multitude was coming to him , said to Philip , " Where are we to buy bread , that these may eat ? "
43006006	This he said to test him , for he himself knew what he would do .
43006007	Philip answered him , " Two hundred denarii worth of bread is not sufficient for them , that everyone of them may receive a little . "
43006008	One of his disciples , Andrew , Simon Peter's brother , said to him ,
43006009	" There is a boy here who has five barley loaves and two fish , but what are these among so many ? "
43006010	Jesus said , " Have the people sit down . " Now there was much grass in that place . So the men sat down , in number about five thousand .
43006011	Jesus took the loaves ; and having given thanks , he distributed to the disciples , and the disciples to those who were sitting down ; likewise also of the fish as much as they desired .
43006012	When they were filled , he said to his disciples , " Gather up the broken pieces which are left over , that nothing be lost . "
43006013	So they gathered them up , and filled twelve baskets with broken pieces from the five barley loaves , which were left over by those who had eaten .
43006014	When therefore the people saw the sign which Jesus did , they said , " This is truly the prophet who comes into the world . "
43006015	Jesus therefore , perceiving that they were about to come and take him by force , to make him king , withdrew again into the mountain by himself .
43006016	When evening came , his disciples went down to the sea ,
43006017	and they entered into the boat , and were going over the sea to Capernaum . It was now dark , and Jesus had not come to them .
43006018	The sea was rising by reason of a great wind that blew .
43006019	When therefore they had rowed about twenty-five or thirty stadia , they saw Jesus walking on the sea , and drawing near to the boat ; and they were afraid .
43006020	But he said to them , " It is I . Don't be afraid . "
43006021	They were willing therefore to receive him into the boat . Immediately the boat was at the land where they were going .
43006022	On the next day , the multitude that stood on the other side of the sea saw that there was no other boat there , except the one which his disciples had entered , and that Jesus hadn't entered with his disciples into the boat , but his disciples went away alone .
43006023	However boats from Tiberias came near to the place where they ate the bread after the Lord had given thanks .
43006024	When the multitude therefore saw that Jesus wasn't there , neither his disciples , they themselves got into the boats , and came to Capernaum , seeking Jesus .
43006025	When they found him on the other side of the sea , they asked him , " Rabbi , when did you come here ? "
43006026	Jesus answered them , " Most assuredly I tell you , you seek me , not because you saw signs , but because you ate of the loaves , and were filled .
43006027	Don't work for the food which perishes , but for the food which remains to eternal life , which the Son of Man will give to you . For the Father , even God , has sealed him . "
43006028	They said therefore to him , " What must we do , that we may work the works of God ? "
43006029	Jesus answered them , " This is the work of God , that you believe in him whom he has sent . "
43006030	They said therefore to him , " What then do you do for a sign , that we may see , and believe you ? What work do you do ?
43006031	Our fathers ate the manna in the wilderness . As it is written , ' He gave them bread out of the sky to eat . ' "
43006032	Jesus therefore said to them , " Most assuredly , I tell you , it wasn't Moses who gave you the bread out of heaven , but my Father gives you the true bread out of heaven .
43006033	For the bread of God is that which comes down out of heaven , and gives life to the world . "
43006034	They said therefore to him , " Lord , always give us this bread . "
43006035	Jesus said to them . " I am the bread of life . He who comes to me will not be hungry , and he who believes in me will never be thirsty .
43006036	But I told you that you have seen me , and yet don't believe .
43006037	All that which the Father gives me will come to me . Him who comes to me I will in no way throw out .
43006038	For I have come down from heaven , not to do my own will , but the will of him who sent me .
43006039	This is the will of my Father who sent me , that of all who he has given to me I should lose nothing , but should raise them up at the last day .
43006040	This is the will of the one who sent me , that everyone who sees the Son , and believes in him , should have eternal life ; and I will raise him up at the last day . "
43006041	The Jews therefore murmured concerning him , because he said , " I am the bread which came down out of heaven . "
43006042	They said , " Isn't this Jesus , the son of Joseph , whose father and mother we know ? How then does he say , ' I have come down out of heaven ? ' "
43006043	Therefore Jesus answered them , " Don't murmur among yourselves .
43006044	No one can come to me unless the Father who sent me draws him , and I will raise him up in the last day .
43006045	It is written in the prophets , ' They will all be taught by God . ' Everyone who hears from the Father , and has learned , comes to me .
43006046	Not that any man has seen the Father , except he who is from God . He has seen the Father .
43006047	Most assuredly , I tell you , he who believes in me has eternal life .
43006048	I am the bread of life .
43006049	Your fathers ate the manna in the wilderness , and they died .
43006050	This is the bread which comes down out of heaven , that a man may eat of it , and not die .
43006051	I am the living bread which came down out of heaven . If anyone eats of this bread , he will live forever . Yes , the bread which I will give is my flesh , for the life of the world . "
43006052	The Jews therefore contended with one another , saying , " How can this man give us his flesh to eat ? "
43006053	Jesus therefore said to them , " Most assuredly I tell you , unless you eat the flesh of the Son of Man and drink his blood , you don't have life in yourselves .
43006054	He who eats my flesh and drinks my blood has eternal life , and I will raise him up at the last day .
43006055	For my flesh is food indeed , and my blood is drink indeed .
43006056	He who eats my flesh and drinks my blood lives in me , and I in him .
43006057	As the living Father sent me , and I live because of the Father ; so he who feeds on me , he will also live because of me .
43006058	This is the bread which came down out of heaven - - not as our fathers ate the manna , and died . He who eats this bread will live forever . "
43006059	These things he said in the synagogue , as he taught in Capernaum .
43006060	Therefore many of his disciples , when they heard this , said , " This is a hard saying ! Who can hear it ? "
43006061	But Jesus knowing in himself that his disciples murmured at this , said to them , " Does this cause you to stumble ?
43006062	What if you would see the Son of Man ascending to where he was before ?
43006063	It is the spirit who gives life . The flesh profits nothing . The words that I speak to you are spirit , and are life .
43006064	But there are some of you who don't believe . " For Jesus knew from the beginning who they were who didn't believe , and who it was who would betray him .
43006065	He said , " For this cause have I said to you that no one can come to me , except it be given to him by my Father . "
43006066	At this , many of his disciples went back , and walked no more with him .
43006067	Jesus said therefore to the twelve , " You don't also want to go away , do you ? "
43006068	Simon Peter answered him , " Lord , to whom would we go ? You have the words of eternal life .
43006069	We have come to believe and know that you are the Christ , the Son of the living God . "
43006070	Jesus answered them , " Didn't I choose you , the twelve , and one of you is a devil ? "
43006071	Now he spoke of Judas , the son of Simon Iscariot , for it was he who would betray him , being one of the twelve .
43007001	After these things , Jesus walked in Galilee , for he would not walk in Judea , because the Jews sought to kill him .
43007002	Now the feast of the Jews , the Feast of Booths , was at hand .
43007003	His brothers therefore said to him , " Depart from here , and go into Judea , that your disciples also may see your works which you do .
43007004	For no man does anything in secret , and himself seeks to be known openly . If you do these things , reveal yourself to the world . "
43007005	For even his brothers didn't believe in him .
43007006	Jesus therefore said to them , " My time has not yet come , but your time is always ready .
43007007	The world can't hate you , but it hates me , because I testify about it , that its works are evil .
43007008	You go up to the feast . I am not yet going up to this feast , because my time is not yet fulfilled . "
43007009	Having said these things to them , he stayed in Galilee .
43007010	But when his brothers had gone up to the feast , then he also went up , not publicly , but as it were in secret .
43007011	The Jews therefore sought him at the feast , and said , " Where is he ? "
43007012	There was much murmuring among the multitudes concerning him . Some said , " He is a good man . " Others said , " Not so , but he leads the multitude astray . "
43007013	Yet no one spoke openly of him for fear of the Jews .
43007014	But when it was now the midst of the feast , Jesus went up into the temple and taught .
43007015	The Jews therefore marveled , saying , " How does this man know letters , having never been educated ? "
43007016	Jesus therefore answered them , " My teaching is not mine , but his who sent me .
43007017	If anyone desires to do his will , he will know of the teaching , whether it is from God , or if I speak from myself .
43007018	He who speaks from himself seeks his own glory , but he who seeks the glory of him who sent him , the same is true , and no unrighteousness is in him .
43007019	Didn't Moses give you the law , and yet none of you keeps the law ? Why do you seek to kill me ? "
43007020	The multitude answered , " You have a demon ! Who seeks to kill you ? "
43007021	Jesus answered them , " I did one work , and you all marvel because of it .
43007022	Moses has given you circumcision ( not that it is of Moses , but of the fathers ) , and on the Sabbath you circumcise a boy .
43007023	If a boy receives circumcision on the Sabbath , that the law of Moses may not be broken , are you angry with me , because I made a man every bit whole on the Sabbath ?
43007024	Don't judge according to appearance , but judge righteous judgment . "
43007025	Some therefore of them of Jerusalem said , " Isn't this he whom they seek to kill ?
43007026	Behold , he speaks openly , and they say nothing to him . Can it be that the rulers indeed know that this is truly the Christ ?
43007027	However we know where this man comes from , but when the Christ comes , no one will know where he comes from . "
43007028	Jesus therefore cried out in the temple , teaching and saying , " You both know me , and know where I am from . I have not come of myself , but he who sent me is true , whom you don't know .
43007029	I know him , because I am from him , and he sent me . "
43007030	They sought therefore to take him . No one laid a hand on him , because his hour was not yet come .
43007031	But of the multitude , many believed in him . They said , " When the Christ comes , will he do more signs than those which this man has done ? "
43007032	The Pharisees heard the multitude murmuring these things concerning him , and the chief priests and the Pharisees sent officers to take him .
43007033	Then Jesus said , " Yet a little while , am I with you , then I go to him who sent me .
43007034	You will seek me , and won't find me ; and where I am , you can't come . "
43007035	The Jews therefore said among themselves , " Where will this man go that we won't find him ? Will he go to the Dispersion among the Greeks , and teach the Greeks ?
43007036	What is this word that he said , ' You will seek me , and won't find me ; and where I am , you can't come ? ' "
43007037	Now on the last and greatest day of the feast , Jesus stood and cried out , " If anyone is thirsty , let him come to me and drink !
43007038	He who believes in me , as the scripture has said , from within him will flow rivers of living water . "
43007039	But he said this about the Spirit , which those believing in him were to receive . For the Holy Spirit was not yet given , because Jesus wasn't yet glorified .
43007040	Many of the multitude therefore , when they heard these words , said , " This is truly the prophet . "
43007041	Others said , " This is the Christ . " But some said , " What , does the Christ come out of Galilee ?
43007042	Hasn't the scripture said that the Christ comes of the seed of David , and from Bethlehem , the village where David was ? "
43007043	So there arose a division in the multitude because of him .
43007044	Some of them would have taken him , but no one laid hands on him .
43007045	The officers therefore came to the chief priests and Pharisees , and they said to them , " Why didn't you bring him ? "
43007046	The officers answered , " No man ever spoke like this man ! "
43007047	The Pharisees therefore answered them , " Are you also led astray ?
43007048	Has any of the rulers believed in him , or of the Pharisees ?
43007049	But this cursed multitude doesn't know the law . "
43007050	Nicodemus ( he who came to him by night , being one of them ) said to them ,
43007051	" Does our law judge a man , unless it first hears from him personally and knows what he does ? "
43007052	They answered him , " Are you also from Galilee ? Search , and see that no prophet has arisen out of Galilee . "
43007053	Everyone went to his own house ,
43008001	but Jesus went to the Mount of Olives .
43008002	At dawn , he came again into the temple , and all the people came to him . He sat down , and taught them .
43008003	The scribes and the Pharisees brought a woman taken in adultery . Having set her in the midst ,
43008004	they told him , " Teacher , we found this woman in adultery , in the very act .
43008005	Now in our law , Moses commanded us to stone such . What then do you say about her ? "
43008006	They said this testing him , that they might have something to accuse him of . But Jesus stooped down , and wrote on the ground with his finger , as if he didn't hear .
43008007	But when they continued asking him , he lifted himself up , and said to them , " He who is without sin among you , let him throw the first stone at her . "
43008008	Again he stooped down , and with his finger wrote on the ground .
43008009	They , when they heard it , being convicted by their conscience , went out one by one , beginning from the oldest , even to the last . Jesus was left alone with the woman where she was , in the midst .
43008010	Jesus lifted himself up , and seeing no one but the woman , said to her , " Woman , where are they ? Did no one condemn you ? "
43008011	She said , " No one , Lord . " Jesus said , " Neither do I condemn you . Go your way . From now on , sin no more . "
43008012	Again , therefore , Jesus spoke to them , saying , " I am the light of the world . He who follows me will not walk in the darkness , but will have the light of life . "
43008013	The Pharisees therefore said to him , " You testify about yourself . Your witness is not valid . "
43008014	Jesus answered them , " Even if I testify about myself , my witness is true , for I know where I came from , and where I am going ; but you don't know where I came from , or where I am going .
43008015	You judge according to the flesh . I judge no one .
43008016	Even if I do judge , my judgment is true , for I am not alone , but I am with the Father who sent me .
43008017	It's also written in your law that the testimony of two men is valid .
43008018	I am he who testifies about myself , and the Father who sent me testifies about me . "
43008019	They said therefore to him , " Where is your Father ? " Jesus answered , " You know neither me , nor my Father . If you knew me , you would know my Father also . "
43008020	Jesus spoke these words in the treasury , as he taught in the temple . No one took him , because his hour had not yet come .
43008021	Jesus said therefore again to them , " I am going away , and you will seek me , and will die in your sins . Where I go , you can't come . "
43008022	The Jews therefore said , " Will he kill himself , that he says , ' Where I am going , you can't come ? ' "
43008023	He said to them , " You are from beneath . I am from above . You are of this world . I am not of this world .
43008024	I said therefore to you that you will die in your sins ; for unless you believe that I am he , you will die in your sins . "
43008025	They said therefore to him , " Who are you ? " Jesus said to them , " Just what I have been saying to you from the beginning .
43008026	I have many things to speak and to judge concerning you . However he who sent me is true ; and the things which I heard from him , these I say to the world . "
43008027	They didn't perceive that he spoke to them about the Father .
43008028	Jesus therefore said to them , " When you have lifted up the Son of Man , then will you know that I am he , and that I do nothing of myself , but as my Father taught me , I say these things .
43008029	He who sent me is with me . The Father hasn't left me alone , for I always do the things that are pleasing to him . "
43008030	As he spoke these things , many believed in him .
43008031	Jesus therefore said to those Jews who had believed him , " If you remain in my word , then you are truly my disciples .
43008032	You will know the truth , and the truth will make you free . "
43008033	They answered him , " We are Abraham's seed , and have never yet been in bondage to anyone . How do you say , ' You will be made free ? ' "
43008034	Jesus answered them , " Most assuredly I tell you , everyone who commits sin is the bondservant of sin .
43008035	A bondservant doesn't live in the house forever . A son remains forever .
43008036	If therefore the Son makes you free , you will be free indeed .
43008037	I know that you are Abraham's seed , yet you seek to kill me , because my word finds no place in you .
43008038	I say the things which I have seen with my Father ; and you also do the things which you have seen with your father . "
43008039	They answered him , " Our father is Abraham . " Jesus said to them , " If you were Abraham's children , you would do the works of Abraham .
43008040	But now you seek to kill me , a man who has told you the truth , which I heard from God . Abraham didn't do this .
43008041	You do the works of your father . " They said to him , " We were not born of sexual immorality . We have one Father , God . "
43008042	Therefore Jesus said to them , " If God were your Father , you would love me , for I came forth and have come from God . For neither have I come of myself , but he sent me .
43008043	Why don't you understand my speech ? Because you can't hear my word .
43008044	You are of your Father , the devil , and it is your desire to do the lusts of your father . He was a murderer from the beginning , and doesn't stand in the truth , because there is no truth in him . When he speaks a lie , he speaks of his own ; for he is a liar , and the father of it .
43008045	But because I tell the truth , you don't believe me .
43008046	Which of you convicts me of sin ? If I tell the truth , why do you not believe me ?
43008047	He who is of God hears the words of God . For this cause you don't hear , because you are not of God . "
43008048	Then the Jews answered him , " Don't we say well that you are a Samaritan , and have a demon ? "
43008049	Jesus answered , " I don't have a demon , but I honor my Father , and you dishonor me .
43008050	But I don't seek my own glory . There is one who seeks and judges .
43008051	Most assuredly , I tell you , if a person keeps my word , he will never see death . "
43008052	Then the Jews said to him , " Now we know that you have a demon . Abraham died , and the prophets ; and you say , ' If a man keeps my word , he will never taste of death . '
43008053	Are you greater than our father , Abraham , who died ? The prophets died . Who do you make yourself out to be ? "
43008054	Jesus answered , " If I glorify myself , my glory is nothing . It is my Father who glorifies me , of whom you say that he is our God .
43008055	You have not known him , but I know him . If I said , ' I don't know him , ' I would be like you , a liar . But I know him , and keep his word .
43008056	Your father Abraham rejoiced to see my day . He saw it , and was glad . "
43008057	The Jews therefore said to him , " You are not yet fifty years old , and have you seen Abraham ? "
43008058	Jesus said to them , " Most assuredly , I tell you , before Abraham was born , I AM . "
43008059	They took up stones therefore to throw at him , but Jesus hid himself , and went out of the temple , going through the midst of them , and so passed by .
43009001	As he passed by , he saw a man blind from his birth .
43009002	His disciples asked him , " Rabbi , who sinned , this man or his parents , that he was born blind ? "
43009003	Jesus answered , " Neither did this man sin , nor his parents . But , that the works of God might be revealed in him ,
43009004	I must work the works of him who sent me , while it is day . The night is coming , when no one can work .
43009005	When I am in the world , I am the light of the world . "
43009006	When he had said this , he spat on the ground , made mud with the saliva , anointed the blind man's eyes with the mud ,
43009007	and said to him , " Go , wash in the pool of Siloam " ( which means " Sent " ) . So he went away , washed , and came seeing .
43009008	The neighbors therefore , and those who saw that he was blind , before , said , " Isn't this he who sat and begged ? "
43009009	Others said , " It is he . " Still others said , " He is like him . " He said , " I am he . "
43009010	They said therefore to him , " How were your eyes opened ? "
43009011	He answered , " A man called Jesus made mud , anointed my eyes , and said to me , " Go to the pool of Siloam , and wash . " So I went away and washed , and I received sight . "
43009012	Then they asked him , " Where is he ? " He said , " I don't know . "
43009013	They brought him who before was blind to the Pharisees .
43009014	It was a Sabbath when Jesus made the mud and opened his eyes .
43009015	Again therefore the Pharisees also asked him how he received his sight . He said to them , " He put mud on my eyes , I washed , and I see . "
43009016	Some therefore of the Pharisees said , " This man is not from God , because he doesn't keep the Sabbath . " Others said , " How can a man who is a sinner do such signs ? " There was division among them .
43009017	Therefore they asked the blind man again , " What do you say about him , in that he opened your eyes ? " He said , " He is a prophet . "
43009018	The Jews therefore did not believe concerning him , that he had been blind , and had received his sight , until they called the parents of him who had received his sight ,
43009019	and asked them , " Is this your son , who you say was born blind ? How then does he now see ? "
43009020	His parents answered them , " We know that this is our son , and that he was born blind ;
43009021	but how he now sees , we don't know ; or who opened his eyes , we don't know . He is of age . Ask him . He will speak for himself . "
43009022	His parents said these things because they feared the Jews ; for the Jews had already agreed that if any man would confess him as Christ , he would be put out of the synagogue .
43009023	Therefore his parents said , " He is of age . Ask him . "
43009024	So they called the man who was blind a second time , and said to him , " Give glory to God . We know that this man is a sinner . "
43009025	He therefore answered , " I don't know if he is a sinner . One thing I know : that though I was blind , now I see . "
43009026	They said to him again , " What did he do to you ? How did he open your eyes ? "
43009027	He answered them , " I told you already , and you didn't listen . Why do you want to hear it again ? Do you also want to become his disciples ? "
43009028	They became abusive towards him and said , " You are his disciple , but we are disciples of Moses .
43009029	We know that God has spoken to Moses . But as for this man , we don't know where he comes from . "
43009030	The man answered them , " How amazing ! You don't know where he comes from , yet he opened my eyes .
43009031	We know that God doesn't listen to sinners , but if anyone is a worshipper of God , and does his will , he listens to him .
43009032	Since the world began it has never been heard of that anyone opened the eyes of a man born blind .
43009033	If this man were not from God , he could do nothing . "
43009034	They answered him , " You were altogether born in sins , and do you teach us ? " They threw him out .
43009035	Jesus heard that they had thrown him out , and finding him , he said , " Do you believe in the Son of God ? "
43009036	He answered , " Who is he , Lord , that I may believe in him ? "
43009037	Jesus said to him , " You have both seen him , and it is he who speaks with you . "
43009038	He said , " Lord , I believe ! " and he worshipped him .
43009039	Jesus said , " I came into this world for judgment , that those who don't see may see ; and that those who see may become blind . "
43009040	Those of the Pharisees who were with him heard these things , and said to him , " Are we also blind ? "
43009041	Jesus said to them , " If you were blind , you would have no sin ; but now you say , ' We see . ' Therefore your sin remains .
43010001	" Most assuredly , I tell you , he who doesn't enter by the door into the sheep fold , but climbs up some other way , the same is a thief and a robber .
43010002	But he who enters in by the door is the shepherd of the sheep .
43010003	The gatekeeper opens the gate for him , and the sheep listen to his voice . He calls his own sheep by name , and leads them out .
43010004	Whenever he brings out his own sheep , he goes before them , and the sheep follow him , for they know his voice .
43010005	They will by no means follow a stranger , but will flee from him ; for they don't know the voice of strangers . "
43010006	Jesus spoke this parable to them , but they didn't understand what he was telling them .
43010007	Jesus therefore said to them again , " Most assuredly , I tell you , I am the sheep's door .
43010008	All who came before me are thieves and robbers , but the sheep didn't listen to them .
43010009	I am the door . If anyone enters in by me , he will be saved , and will go in and go out , and will find pasture .
43010010	The thief only comes to steal , kill , and destroy . I came that they may have life , and may have it abundantly .
43010011	I am the good shepherd . The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep .
43010012	He who is a hired hand , and not a shepherd , who doesn't own the sheep , sees the wolf coming , leaves the sheep , and flees . The wolf snatches the sheep , and scatters them .
43010013	The hired hand flees because he is a hired hand , and doesn't care for the sheep .
43010014	I am the good shepherd . I know my own , and I'm known by my own ;
43010015	even as the Father knows me , and I know the Father . I lay down my life for the sheep .
43010016	I have other sheep , which are not of this fold . I must bring them also , and they will hear my voice . They will become one flock with one shepherd .
43010017	Therefore the Father loves me , because I lay down my life , that I may take it again .
43010018	No one takes it away from me , but I lay it down by myself . I have power to lay it down , and I have power to take it again . I received this commandment from my Father . "
43010019	Therefore a division arose again among the Jews because of these words .
43010020	Many of them said , " He has a demon , and is mad ! Why do you listen to him ? "
43010021	Others said , " These are not the sayings of one possessed with a demon . Can a demon open the eyes of the blind ? "
43010022	It was the Feast of the Dedication at Jerusalem .
43010023	It was winter , and Jesus was walking in the temple , in Solomon's porch .
43010024	The Jews therefore came around him and said to him , " How long will you hold us in suspense ? If you are the Christ , tell us plainly . "
43010025	Jesus answered them , " I told you , and you don't believe . The works that I do in my Father's name , these testify about me .
43010026	But you don't believe , because you are not of my sheep , as I told you .
43010027	My sheep hear my voice , and I know them , and they follow me .
43010028	I give eternal life to them . They will never perish , and no one will snatch them out of my hand .
43010029	My Father , who has given them to me , is greater than all . No one is able to snatch them out of my Father's hand .
43010030	I and the Father are one . "
43010031	Therefore Jews took up stones again to stone him .
43010032	Jesus answered them , " I have shown you many good works from my Father . For which of those works do you stone me ? "
43010033	The Jews answered him , " We don't stone you for a good work , but for blasphemy : because you , being a man , make yourself God . "
43010034	Jesus answered them , " Isn't it written in your law , ' I said , you are gods ? '
43010035	If he called them gods , to whom the word of God came ( and the scripture can't be broken ) ,
43010036	Do you say of him whom the Father sanctified and sent into the world , ' You blaspheme , ' because I said , ' I am the Son of God ? '
43010037	If I don't do the works of my Father , don't believe me .
43010038	But if I do them , though you don't believe me , believe the works ; that you may know and believe that the Father is in me , and I in the Father . "
43010039	They sought again to seize him , and he went forth out of their hand .
43010040	He went away again beyond the Jordan into the place where John was at the first baptizing , and there he stayed .
43010041	Many came to him . They said , " John indeed did no sign , but everything whatever that John said about this man is true . "
43010042	Many believed in him there .
43011001	Now a certain man was sick , Lazarus of Bethany , of the village of Mary and her sister , Martha .
43011002	It was that Mary who anointed the Lord with ointment , and wiped his feet with her hair , whose brother , Lazarus , was sick .
43011003	The sisters therefore sent to him , saying , " Lord , behold , he for whom you have great affection is sick . "
43011004	But when Jesus heard it , he said , " This sickness is not to death , but for the glory of God , that God's Son may be glorified by it . "
43011005	Now Jesus loved Martha , and her sister , and Lazarus .
43011006	When therefore he heard that he was sick , he stayed at that time two days in the place where he was .
43011007	Then after this he said to the disciples , " Let's go into Judea again . "
43011008	The disciples told him , " Rabbi , the Jews were just trying to stone you , and are you going there again ? "
43011009	Jesus answered , " Aren't there twelve hours of daylight ? If a man walks in the day , he doesn't stumble , because he sees the light of this world .
43011010	But if a man walks in the night , he stumbles , because the light isn't in him . "
43011011	He said these things , and after that , he said to them , " Our friend , Lazarus , has fallen asleep , but I am going so that I may awake him out of sleep . "
43011012	The disciples therefore said to him , " Lord , if he has fallen asleep , he will recover . "
43011013	Now Jesus had spoken of his death , but they thought that he spoke of taking rest in sleep .

43011015	I am glad for your sakes that I was not there , so that you may believe . Nevertheless , let's go to him . "
43011016	Thomas therefore , who is called Didymus , said to his fellow disciples , " Let's go also , that we may die with him . "
43011017	So when Jesus came , he found that he had been in the tomb four days already .
43011018	Now Bethany was near Jerusalem , about fifteen stadia away .
43011019	Many of the Jews had come to Martha and Mary , to console them concerning their brother .
43011020	Therefore Martha , when she heard that Jesus was coming , went and met him , but Mary stayed in the house .

43011026	Whoever lives and believes in me will never die . Do you believe this ? "

43011030	Now Jesus had not yet come into the village , but was in the place where Martha met him .

43011034	and said , " Where have you laid him ? " They told him , " Lord , come and see . "

43011036	The Jews therefore said , " See how much affection he had for him ! "
43011037	Some of them said , " Couldn't this man , who opened the eyes of him who was blind , have also caused that this man wouldn't die ? "

43011041	So they took away the stone from the place where the dead man was lying . Jesus lifted up his eyes , and said , " Father , I thank you that you listened to me .
43011042	I know that you always listen to me , but because of the multitude that stands around I said this , that they may believe that you sent me . "
43011043	When he had said this , he cried with a loud voice , " Lazarus , come out ! "

43011048	If we leave him alone like this , everyone will believe in him , and the Romans will come and take away both our place and our nation . "
43011049	But a certain one of them , Caiaphas , being high priest that year , said to them , " You know nothing at all ,
43011050	nor do you take account that it is advantageous for us that one man should die for the people , and that the whole nation not perish . "
43011051	Now he didn't say this of himself , but being high priest that year , he prophesied that Jesus would die for the nation ,
43011052	and not for the nation only , but that he might also gather together into one the children of God who are scattered abroad .
43011053	So from that day forth they took counsel that they might put him to death .

43011056	Then they sought for Jesus and spoke one with another , as they stood in the temple , " What do you think ? Isn't he coming to the feast ? "
43011057	Now the chief priests and the Pharisees had commanded that if anyone knew where he was , he should report it , that they might seize him .
43012001	Therefore six days before the Passover , Jesus came to Bethany , where Lazarus was , who had been dead , whom he raised from the dead .
43012002	So they made him a supper there . Martha served , but Lazarus was one of those who sat at the table with him .
43012003	Mary , therefore , took a pound of ointment of pure nard , very precious , and anointed the feet of Jesus , and wiped his feet with her hair . The house was filled with the fragrance of the ointment .
43012004	Then Judas Iscariot , Simon's son , one of his disciples , who would betray him , said ,
43012005	" Why wasn't this ointment sold for three hundred denarii , and given to the poor ? "
43012006	Now he said this , not because he cared for the poor , but because he was a thief , and having the money box , used to steal what was put into it .
43012007	But Jesus said , " Leave her alone . She has kept this for the day of my burial .
43012008	For you always have the poor with you , but you don't always have me . "
43012009	A large crowd therefore of the Jews learned that he was there , and they came , not for Jesus ' sake only , but that they might see Lazarus also , whom he had raised from the dead .
43012010	But the chief priests conspired to also put Lazarus to death ,
43012011	because on account of him many of the Jews went away and believed in Jesus .

43012013	they took the branches of the palm trees , and went out to meet him , and cried out , " Hosanna ! Blessed is he who comes in the name of the Lord , the King of Israel ! "

43012023	Jesus answered them , " The time has come for the Son of Man to be glorified .
43012024	Most assuredly I tell you , unless a grain of wheat falls into the earth and dies , it remains by itself alone . But if it dies , it bears much fruit .
43012025	He who loves his life will lose it . He who hates his life in this world will keep it to eternal life .

43012037	But though he had done so many signs before them , yet they didn't believe in him ,

43012050	I know that his commandment is eternal life . The things therefore which I speak , even as the Father has said to me , so I speak . "
43013001	Now before the feast of the Passover , Jesus knowing that his time had come that he would depart out of this world to his Father , having loved his own who were in the world , he loved them to the end .

43014001	" Don't let your heart be troubled . Believe in God . Believe also in me .

43015001	" I am the true vine , and my Father is the farmer .
43015002	Every branch in me that doesn't bear fruit , he takes away . Every branch that bears fruit , he prunes , that it may bear more fruit .
43015003	You are already pruned clean because of the word which I have spoken to you .
43015004	Remain in me , and I in you . As the branch can't bear fruit by itself , unless it remains in the vine , so neither can you , unless you remain in me .
43015005	I am the vine . You are the branches . He who remains in me , and I in him , the same bears much fruit , for apart from me you can do nothing .
43015006	If a man doesn't remain in me , he is thrown out as a branch , and is withered ; and they gather them , throw them into the fire , and they are burned .

43015010	If you keep my commandments , you will remain in my love ; even as I have kept my Father's commandments , and remain in his love .

43015018	If the world hates you , you know that it has hated me before it hated you .

43015021	But all these things will they do to you for my name's sake , because they don't know him who sent me .

43015023	He who hates me , hates my Father also .
43015024	If I hadn't done among them the works which none other did , they wouldn't have had sin . But now have they seen and also hated both me and my Father .

43016001	" These things have I spoken to you , so that you wouldn't be caused to stumble .
43016002	They will put you out of the synagogues . Yes , the time comes that whoever kills you will think that he offers service to God .
43016003	They will do these things because they have not known the Father , nor me .

43016008	When he has come , he will convict the world in respect to sin , and righteousness , and judgment ;

43016014	He will glorify me , for he will take from what is mine , and will declare it to you .
43016015	All things whatever the Father has are mine ; therefore I said that he takes of mine , and will declare it to you .
43016016	A little while , and you will not see me . Again a little while , and you will see me . "
43016017	Some of his disciples therefore said to one another , " What is this that he says to us , ' A little while , and you won't see me , and again a little while , and you will see me ; ' and , ' Because I go to the Father ? ' "
43016018	They said therefore , " What is this that he says , ' A little while ? ' We don't know what he is saying . "
43016019	Therefore Jesus perceived that they wanted to ask him , and he said to them , " Do you inquire among yourselves concerning this , that I said , ' A little while , and you won't see me , and again a little while , and you will see me ? '
43016020	Most assuredly I tell you , that you will weep and lament , but the world will rejoice . You will be sorrowful , but your sorrow will be turned into joy .
43016021	A woman , when she is in travail , has sorrow , because her time has come . But when she has delivered the child , she doesn't remember the anguish any more , for the joy that a child is born into the world .
43016022	You therefore now have sorrow , but I will see you again , and your heart will rejoice , and no one will take your joy away from you .

43016024	Until now , you have asked nothing in my name . Ask , and you will receive , that your joy may be made full .
43016025	I have spoken these things to you in figures of speech . But the time comes when I will no more speak to you in figures of speech , but will tell you plainly about the Father .
43016026	In that day you will ask in my name ; and I don't say to you , that I will pray to the Father for you ,
43016027	for the Father himself loves you , because you have loved me , and have believed that I came forth from God .
43016028	I came out from the Father , and have come into the world . Again , I leave the world , and go to the Father . "
43016029	His disciples said to him , " Behold , now you speak plainly , and speak no figures of speech .
43016030	Now we know that you know all things , and don't need for anyone to question you . By this we believe that you came forth from God . "
43016031	Jesus answered them , " Do you now believe ?
43016032	Behold , the time comes , yes , has now come , that you will be scattered , everyone to his own place , and will leave me alone . Yet I am not alone , because the Father is with me .
43016033	I have told you these things , that in me you may have peace . In the world you have oppression ; but cheer up ! I have overcome the world . "
43017001	Jesus said these things , and lifting up his eyes to heaven , he said , " Father , the time has come . Glorify your Son , that your Son may also glorify you ;
43017002	even as you gave him authority over all flesh , that to all whom you have given him , he will give eternal life .
43017003	This is eternal life , that they should know you , the only true God , and him whom you sent , Jesus Christ .
43017004	I glorified you on the earth . I have accomplished the work which you have given me to do .
43017005	Now , Father , glorify me with your own self with the glory which I had with you before the world existed .
43017006	I revealed your name to the people whom you have given me out of the world . They were yours , and you have given them to me . They have kept your word .
43017007	Now they know that all things whatever you have given me are from you ,
43017008	for the words which you have given me I have given to them , and they received them , and knew for sure that I came forth from you , and they believed that you sent me .
43017009	I pray for them . I don't pray for the world , but for those whom you have given me , for they are yours .
43017010	All things that are mine are yours , and yours are mine , and I am glorified in them .
43017011	I am no more in the world , and these are in the world , and I am coming to you . Holy Father , keep them through your name which you have given me , that they may be one , even as we are .
43017012	While I was with them in the world , I kept them in your name . Those whom you have given me I have kept . None of them is lost , except the son of perdition , that the Scripture might be fulfilled .
43017013	But now I come to you , and I say these things in the world , that they may have my joy made full in themselves .
43017014	I have given them your word . The world hated them , because they are not of the world , even as I am not of the world .
43017015	I pray not that you would take them from the world , but that you would keep them from the evil one .
43017016	They are not of the world even as I am not of the world .
43017017	Sanctify them in your truth . Your word is truth .
43017018	As you sent me into the world , even so I sent them into the world .
43017019	For their sakes I sanctify myself , that they themselves also may be sanctified in truth .
43017020	Neither for these only do I pray , but for those also who believe in me through their word ,
43017021	that they may all be one ; even as you , Father , are in me , and I in you , that they also may be one in us ; that the world may believe that you sent me .
43017022	The glory which you have given me , I have given to them ; that they may be one , even as we are one ;
43017023	I in them , and you in me , that they may be perfected into one ; that the world may know that you sent me , and loved them , even as you loved me .
43017024	Father , I desire that they also whom you have given me be with me where I am , that they may see my glory , which you have given me , for you loved me before the foundation of the world .
43017025	Righteous Father , the world didn't know you , but I knew you ; and these knew that you sent me .
43017026	I made known to them your name , and will make it known ; that the love with which you loved me may be in them , and I in them . "
43018001	When Jesus had spoken these words , he went forth with his disciples over the brook Kidron , where was a garden , into which he entered , himself and his disciples .
43018002	Now Judas , who betrayed him , also knew the place , for Jesus often resorted there with his disciples .
43018003	Judas then , having taken a detachment of soldiers and officers from the chief priests and the Pharisees , came there with lanterns , torches , and weapons .
43018004	Jesus therefore , knowing all the things that were coming on him , went forth , and said to them , " Who are you looking for ? "
43018005	They answered him , " Jesus of Nazareth . " Jesus said to them , " I AM . " Judas also , who betrayed him , was standing with them .
43018006	When therefore he said to them , " I AM , " they went backward , and fell to the ground .
43018007	Again therefore he asked them , " Who are you looking for ? " They said , " Jesus of Nazareth . "
43018008	Jesus answered , " I told you that I AM . If therefore you seek me , let these go their way , "

43018010	Simon Peter therefore , having a sword , drew it , and struck the high priest's servant , and cut off his right ear . The servant's name was Malchus .
43018011	Jesus therefore said to Peter , " Put up the sword into its sheath . The cup which the Father has given me , shall I not drink it ? "
43018012	So the detachment , the commanding officer , and the officers of the Jews , seized Jesus and bound him ,
