58010036	For you need patience , so that , having done the will of God , you may receive the promise .
58010037	" For yet a very little while , He who comes will come , and will not wait .
58010038	But the righteous will live by faith . If he shrinks back , my soul has no pleasure in him . "
58010039	But we are not of those who shrink back to destruction , but of those who have faith to the saving of the soul .
58011001	Now faith is assurance of things hoped for , proof of things not seen .
58011002	For by this , the elders obtained testimony .
58011003	By faith , we understand that the universe has been framed by the word of God , so that what is seen has not been made out of things which are visible .
58011004	By faith , Abel offered to God a more excellent sacrifice than Cain , through which he had testimony given to him that he was righteous , God bearing witness with respect to his gifts ; and through it he , being dead , still speaks .
58011005	By faith , Enoch was translated , so that he should not see death , and he was not found , because God translated him . For he has had testimony given to him that before his translation he had been well pleasing to God .
58011006	Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him , for he who comes to God must believe that he exists , and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him .
58011007	By faith , Noah , being warned about things not yet seen , moved with godly fear , prepared an ark for the saving of his house , through which he condemned the world , and became heir of the righteousness which is according to faith .
58011008	By faith , Abraham , when he was called , obeyed to go out to the place which he was to receive for an inheritance . He went out , not knowing where he went .
58011009	By faith , he lived as an alien in the land of promise , as in a land not his own , dwelling in tents , with Isaac and Jacob , the heirs with him of the same promise .
58011010	For he looked for the city which has the foundations , whose builder and maker is God .
58011011	By faith , even Sarah herself received power to conceive , and she bore a child when she was past age , since she counted him faithful who had promised .
58011012	Therefore they were fathered by one , and him as good as dead , as many as the stars of the sky in multitude , and as innumerable as the sand which is by the sea shore .
58011013	These all died in faith , not having received the promises , but having seen them and embraced them from afar , and having confessed that they were strangers and pilgrims on the earth .
58011014	For those who say such things make it clear that they are seeking after a country of their own .
58011015	If indeed they had been thinking of that country from which they went out , they would have had enough time to return .
58011016	But now they desire a better country , that is , a heavenly one . Therefore God is not ashamed of them , to be called their God , for he has prepared a city for them .
58011017	By faith , Abraham , being tested , offered up Isaac . Yes , he who had gladly received the promises was offering up his one and only son ;
58011018	even he to whom it was said , " In Isaac will your seed be called ; "
58011019	accounting that God is able to raise up , even from the dead . Figuratively speaking , he also did receive him back from the dead .
58011020	By faith , Isaac blessed Jacob and Esau , even concerning things to come .
58011021	By faith , Jacob , when he was dying , blessed each of the sons of Joseph , and worshipped , leaning on the top of his staff .
58011022	By faith , Joseph , when his end was near , made mention of the departure of the children of Israel ; and gave instructions concerning his bones .
58011023	By faith , Moses , when he was born , was hidden for three months by his parents , because they saw that he was a beautiful child , and they were not afraid of the king's commandment .
58011024	By faith , Moses , when he had grown up , refused to be called the son of Pharaoh's daughter ,
58011025	choosing rather to share ill treatment with the people of God , than to enjoy the pleasures of sin for a time ;
58011026	accounting the reproach of Christ greater riches than the treasures of Egypt ; for he looked to the reward .
58011027	By faith , he left Egypt , not fearing the wrath of the king ; for he endured , as seeing him who is invisible .
58011028	By faith , he kept the Passover , and the sprinkling of the blood , that the destroyer of the firstborn should not touch them .
58011029	By faith , they passed through the Red sea as by dry land . When the Egyptians tried to do so , they were swallowed up .
58011030	By faith , the walls of Jericho fell down , after they had been encircled for seven days .
58011031	By faith , Rahab , the prostitute , didn't perish with those who were disobedient , having received the spies in peace .
58011032	What will I more say ? For the time will fail me if I tell of Gideon , Barak , Samson , Jephthah , David , Samuel , and the prophets ;
58011033	who , through faith , subdued kingdoms , worked out righteousness , obtained promises , stopped the mouths of lions ,
58011034	quenched the power of fire , escaped the edge of the sword , from weakness were made strong , grew mighty in war , and turned to flight armies of aliens .
58011035	Women received their dead by resurrection . Others were tortured , not accepting their deliverance , that they might obtain a better resurrection .
58011036	Others were tried by mocking and scourging , yes , moreover by bonds and imprisonment .
58011037	They were stoned . They were sawn apart . They were tempted . They were slain with the sword . They went around in sheepskins , in goatskins ; being destitute , afflicted , ill-treated
58011038	( of whom the world was not worthy ) , wandering in deserts and mountains and caves , and the holes of the earth .
58011039	These all , having had testimony given to them through their faith , didn't receive the promise ,
58011040	God having provided some better thing concerning us , so that apart from us they should not be made perfect .
58012001	Therefore let us also , seeing we are surrounded by so great a cloud of witnesses , lay aside every weight and the sin which so easily entangles us , and let us run with patience the race that is set before us ,
58012002	looking to Jesus , the author and perfecter of faith , who for the joy that was set before him endured the cross , despising shame , and has sat down at the right hand of the throne of God .
58012003	For consider him who has endured such contradiction of sinners against himself , that you don't grow weary , fainting in your souls .
58012004	You have not yet resisted to blood , striving against sin ;
58012005	and you have forgotten the exhortation which reasons with you as with sons , " My son , don't take lightly the chastening of the Lord , Nor faint when you are reproved by him ;
58012006	For whom the Lord loves , he chastens , And scourges every son whom he receives . "
58012007	It is for discipline that you endure . God deals with you as with sons , for what son is there whom his father doesn't discipline ?
58012008	But if you are without discipline , whereof all have been made partakers , then are you illegitimate , and not sons .
58012009	Furthermore , we had the fathers of our flesh to chasten us , and we paid them respect . Shall we not much rather be in subjection to the Father of spirits , and live ?
58012010	For they indeed , for a few days , punished us as seemed good to them ; but he for our profit , that we may be partakers of his holiness .
58012011	All chastening seems for the present to be not joyous but grievous ; yet afterward it yields the peaceful fruit of righteousness to those who have been exercised thereby .
58012012	Therefore , lift up the hands that hang down and the feeble knees ,
58012013	and make straight paths for your feet , that that which is lame may not be dislocated , but rather be healed .
58012014	Follow after peace with all men , and the sanctification without which no man will see the Lord ,
58012015	looking carefully lest there be any man who falls short of the grace of God ; lest any root of bitterness springing up trouble you , and thereby the many be defiled ;
58012016	lest there be any sexually immoral person , or profane person , as Esau , who sold his birthright for one meal .
58012017	For you know that even when he afterward desired to inherit the blessing , he was rejected , for he found no place for a change of mind though he sought it diligently with tears .
58012018	For you have not come to a mountain that might be touched , and that burned with fire , and to blackness , darkness , tempest ,
58012019	the sound of a trumpet , and the voice of words ; which those who heard it begged that not one more word should be spoken to them ,
58012020	for they could not stand that which was enjoined , " If even a animal touch the mountain , it will be stoned ; "
58012021	and so fearful was the appearance , that Moses said , " I am terrified and trembling . "
58012022	But you have come to Mount Zion , and to the city of the living God , the heavenly Jerusalem , and to innumerable hosts of angels ,
58012023	to the general assembly and assembly of the firstborn who are enrolled in heaven , to God , the Judge of all , to the spirits of just men made perfect ,
58012024	to Jesus , the mediator of a new covenant , and to the blood of sprinkling that speaks better than that of Abel .
58012025	See that you don't refuse him who speaks . For if they didn't escape when they refused him who warned on the Earth , how much more will we not escape who turn away from him who warns from heaven ,
58012026	whose voice shook the earth , then , but now he has promised , saying , " Yet once more will I shake not only the earth , but also the heavens . "
58012027	This phrase , " Yet once more , " signifies the removing of those things that are shaken , as of things that have been made , that those things which are not shaken may remain .
58012028	Therefore , receiving a kingdom that can't be shaken , let us have grace , whereby we may offer service well pleasing to God , with reverence and awe ,
58012029	for our God is a consuming fire .
58013001	Let brotherly love continue .
58013002	Don't forget to show hospitality to strangers , for in doing so , some have entertained angels without knowing it .
58013003	Remember those who are in bonds , as bound with them ; and those who are ill-treated , since you are also in the body .
58013004	Let marriage be held in honor among all , and let the bed be undefiled : but God will judge the sexually immoral and adulterers .
58013005	Be free from the love of money , content with such things as you have , for he has said , " I will in no way leave you , neither will I in any way forsake you . "
58013006	So that with good courage we say , " The Lord is my helper . I will not fear . What will man do to me ? "
58013007	Remember your leaders , men who spoke to you the word of God , and considering the results of their conduct , imitate their faith .
58013008	Jesus Christ is the same yesterday , today , and forever .
58013009	Don't be carried away by various and strange teachings , for it is good that the heart be established by grace , not by food , through which those who were so occupied were not benefited .
58013010	We have an altar from which those who serve the holy tent have no right to eat .
58013011	For the bodies of those animals , whose blood is brought into the holy place by the high priest as an offering for sin , are burned outside of the camp .
58013012	Therefore Jesus also , that he might sanctify the people through his own blood , suffered outside of the gate .
58013013	Let us therefore go forth to him outside of the camp , bearing his reproach .
58013014	For we don't have here an enduring city , but we seek that which is to come .
58013015	Through him , then , let us offer up a sacrifice of praise to God continually , that is , the fruit of lips which make confession to his name .
58013016	But don't forget to be doing good and sharing , for with such sacrifices God is well pleased .
58013017	Obey those who have the rule over you , and submit to them , for they watch on behalf of your souls , as those who will give account , that they may do this with joy , and not with groaning , for that would be unprofitable for you .
58013018	Pray for us , for we are persuaded that we have a good conscience , desiring to live honorably in all things .
58013019	I strongly urge you to do this , that I may be restored to you sooner .
58013020	Now may the God of peace , who brought again from the dead the great shepherd of the sheep with the blood of an eternal covenant , our Lord Jesus ,
58013021	make you complete in every good work to do his will , working in you that which is well pleasing in his sight , through Jesus Christ , to whom be the glory forever and ever . Amen .
58013022	But I exhort you , brothers , endure the word of exhortation , for I have written to you in few words .
58013023	Know that our brother Timothy has been freed , with whom , if he comes shortly , I will see you .
58013024	Greet all of your leaders and all the saints . The Italians Greet you .
58013025	Grace be with you all . Amen .
59001001	James , a servant of God and of the Lord Jesus Christ , to the twelve tribes which are in the Dispersion : greetings .
59001002	Count it all joy , my brothers , when you fall into various temptations ,
59001003	Knowing that the testing of your faith produces patience .
59001004	Let patience have its perfect work , that you may be perfect and complete , lacking in nothing .
59001005	But if any of you lacks wisdom , let him ask of God , who gives to all liberally and without reproach ; and it will be given him .
59001006	But let him ask in faith , without any doubting , for he who doubts is like a wave of the sea , driven by the wind and tossed .
59001007	For let that man not think that he will receive anything from the Lord .
59001008	He is a double-minded man , unstable in all his ways .
59001009	But let the brother in humble circumstances glory in his high position ;
59001010	and the rich , in that he is made humble , because like the flower in the grass , he will pass away .
59001011	For the sun arises with the scorching wind , and withers the grass , and the flower in it falls , and the beauty of its appearance perishes . So also will the rich man fade away in his pursuits .
59001012	Blessed is the man who endures temptation , for when he has been approved , he will receive the crown of life , which the Lord promised to those who love him .
59001013	Let no man say when he is tempted , " I am tempted by God , " for God can't be tempted with evil , and he himself tempts no one .
59001014	But each one is tempted , when he is drawn away by his own lust , and enticed .
59001015	Then the lust , when it has conceived , bears sin ; and the sin , when it is full grown , brings forth death .
59001016	Don't be deceived , my beloved brothers .
59001017	Every good gift and every perfect gift is from above , coming down from the Father of lights , with whom can be no variation , nor turning shadow .
59001018	Of his own will he brought us forth by the word of truth , that we should be a kind of first fruits of his creatures .
59001019	So , then , my beloved brothers , let every man be swift to hear , slow to speak , and slow to anger ;
59001020	for the anger of man doesn't produce the righteousness of God .
59001021	Therefore , putting away all filthiness and overflowing of wickedness , receive with humility the implanted word , which is able to save your souls .
59001022	But be doers of the word , and not only hearers , deluding your own selves .
59001023	For if anyone is a hearer of the word and not a doer , he is like a man beholding his natural face in a mirror ;
59001024	for he sees himself , and goes away , and immediately forgets what kind of man he was .
59001025	But he who looks into the perfect law , the law of freedom , and continues , not being a hearer who forgets but a doer of the work , this man will be blessed in what he does .
59001026	If anyone among you thinks himself to be religious , while he doesn't bridle his tongue , but deceives his heart , this man's religion is worthless .
59001027	Pure religion and undefiled before our God and Father is this : to visit the fatherless and widows in their affliction , and to keep oneself unstained by the world .
59002001	My brothers , don't hold the faith of our Lord Jesus Christ , [ the Lord ] of glory , with respect of persons .
59002002	For if a man with a gold ring , in fine clothing , comes into your assembly , and there come in also a poor man in filthy clothing ;
59002003	and you pay special attention to him who wears the fine clothing , and say , " Sit here in a good place ; " and you tell the poor man , " Stand there , " or " Sit by my footstool ; "
59002004	haven't you shown partiality among yourselves , and become judges with evil thoughts ?
59002005	Listen , my beloved brothers . Didn't God choose those who are poor in this world to be rich in faith , and heirs of the kingdom which he promised to those who love him ?
59002006	But you have dishonored the poor man . Don't the rich oppress you , and personally drag you before the courts ?
59002007	Don't they blaspheme the honorable name by which you are called ?
59002008	However , if you fulfill the royal law , according to the Scripture , " You shall love your neighbor as yourself , " you do well .
59002009	But if you show partiality , you commit sin , being convicted by the law as transgressors .
59002010	For whoever shall keep the whole law , and yet stumble in one point , he has become guilty of all .
59002011	For he who said , " Do not commit adultery , " said also , " Do not commit murder . " Now if you do not commit adultery , but murder , you have become a transgressor of the law .
59002012	So speak , and so do , as men who are to be judged by a law of freedom .
59002013	For judgment is without mercy to him who has showed no mercy . Mercy triumphs over judgment .
59002014	What good is it , my brothers , if a man says he has faith , but has no works ? Can that faith save him ?
59002015	And if a brother or sister is naked and in lack of daily food ,
59002016	and one of you tells them , " Go in peace , be warmed and filled ; " and yet you didn't give them the things the body needs , what good is it ?
59002017	Even so faith , if it has no works , is dead in itself .
59002018	Yes , a man will say , " You have faith , and I have works . " Show me your faith without your works , and I by my works will show you my faith .
59002019	You believe that God is one . You do well . The demons also believe , and shudder .
59002020	But do you want to know , vain man , that faith apart from works is dead ?
59002021	Wasn't Abraham , our father , justified by works , in that he offered up Isaac his son on the altar ?
59002022	You see that faith worked with his works , and by works faith was perfected ;
59002023	and the scripture was fulfilled which says , " Abraham believed God , and it was accounted to him as righteousness ; " and he was called the friend of God .
59002024	You see then that by works , a man is justified , and not only by faith .
59002025	In like manner wasn't Rahab the prostitute also justified by works , in that she received the messengers , and sent them out another way ?
59002026	For as the body apart from the spirit is dead , even so faith apart from works is dead .
59003001	Let not many of you be teachers , my brothers , knowing that we will receive heavier judgment .
59003002	For in many things we all stumble . If anyone doesn't stumble in word , the same is a perfect man , able to bridle the whole body also .
59003003	Indeed , we put bits into the horses ' mouths so that they may obey us , and we turn about their whole body .
59003004	Behold , the ships also , though they are so big and are driven by fierce winds , are yet turned about by a very small rudder , wherever the pilot desires .
59003005	So the tongue is also a little member , and boasts great things . Behold , how much wood is kindled by how small a fire !
59003006	And the tongue is a fire . The world of iniquity among our members is the tongue , which defiles the whole body , and sets on fire the course of nature , and is set on fire by Gehenna .
59003007	For every kind of animal , bird , creeping thing , and thing in the sea , is tamed , and has been tamed by mankind .
59003008	But nobody can tame the tongue . It is a restless evil , full of deadly poison .
59003009	With it we bless our God and Father , and with it we curse men , who are made in the image of God .
59003010	Out of the same mouth comes forth blessing and cursing . My brothers , these things ought not to be so .
59003011	Does a spring send forth from the same opening fresh and bitter water ?
59003012	Can a fig tree , my brothers , yield olives , or a vine figs ? Thus no spring yields both salt water and fresh water .
59003013	Who is wise and understanding among you ? Let him show his deeds done in gentleness of wisdom by his good life .
59003014	But if you have bitter jealousy and selfish ambition in your heart , don't boast and don't lie against the truth .
59003015	This wisdom is not that which comes down from above , but is earthly , sensual , and demonic .
59003016	For where jealousy and selfish ambition are , there is confusion and every evil deed .
59003017	But the wisdom that is from above is first pure , then peaceful , gentle , reasonable , full of mercy and good fruits , without partiality , and without hypocrisy .
59003018	Now the fruit of righteousness is sown in peace by those who make peace .
59004001	Where do wars and fightings among you come from ? Don't they come from your pleasures that war in your members ?
59004002	You lust , and don't have . You kill , covet , and can't obtain . You fight and make war . Yet you don't have , because you don't ask .
59004003	You ask , and don't receive , because you ask amiss , so that you may spend it for your pleasures .
59004004	You adulterers and adulteresses , don't you know that friendship with the world is enmity with God ? Whoever therefore wants to be a friend of the world makes himself an enemy of God .
59004005	Or do you think that the Scripture says in vain , " The Spirit who lives in us yearns jealously " ?
59004006	But he gives more grace . Therefore it says , " God resists the proud , but gives grace to the humble . "
59004007	Be subject therefore to God . But resist the devil , and he will flee from you .
59004008	Draw near to God , and he will draw near to you . Cleanse your hands , you sinners ; and purify your hearts , you double-minded .
59004009	Lament , mourn , and weep . Let your laughter be turned to mourning , and your joy to gloom .
59004010	Humble yourselves in the sight of the Lord , and he will exalt you .
59004011	Don't speak against one another , brothers . He who speaks against a brother and judges his brother , speaks against the law and judges the law . But if you judge the law , you are not a doer of the law , but a judge .
59004012	Only one is the lawgiver , who is able to save and to destroy . But who are you to judge another ?
59004013	Come now , you who say , " Today or tomorrow let's go into this city , and spend a year there , and trade , and get gain . "
59004014	Whereas you don't know what your life will be like tomorrow . For what is your life ? For you are a vapor , that appears for a little time , and then vanishes away .
59004015	For you ought to say , " If the Lord wills , we will both live , and do this or that . "
59004016	But now you glory in your boasting . All such boasting is evil .
59004017	To him therefore who knows to do good , and doesn't do it , to him it is sin .
59005001	Come now , you rich , weep and howl for your miseries that are coming on you .
59005002	Your riches are corrupted and your garments are moth-eaten .
59005003	Your gold and your silver are corroded , and their corrosion will be for a testimony against you , and will eat your flesh like fire . You have laid up your treasure in the last days .
59005004	Behold , the wages of the laborers who mowed your fields , which you have kept back by fraud , cries out , and the cries of those who reaped have entered into the ears of the Lord of Hosts .
59005005	You have lived delicately on the earth , and taken your pleasure . You have nourished your hearts as in a day of slaughter .
59005006	You have condemned , you have murdered the righteous one . He doesn't resist you .
59005007	Be patient therefore , brothers , until the coming of the Lord . Behold , the farmer waits for the precious fruit of the earth , being patient over it , until it receives the early and late rain .
59005008	You also be patient . Establish your hearts , for the coming of the Lord is at hand .
59005009	Don't grumble , brothers , against one another , so that you won't be judged . Behold , the judge stands at the door .
59005010	Take , brothers , for an example of suffering and of patience , the prophets who spoke in the name of the Lord .
59005011	Behold , we call them blessed who endured . You have heard of the patience of Job , and have seen the Lord in the end , and how the Lord is full of compassion and mercy .
59005012	But above all things , my brothers , don't swear , neither by heaven , nor by the earth , nor by any other oath ; but let your yes be yes , and your no , no ; so that you don't fall into hypocrisy .
59005013	Is any among you suffering ? Let him pray . Is any cheerful ? Let him sing praises .
59005014	Is any among you sick ? Let him call for the elders of the assembly , and let them pray over him , anointing him with oil in the name of the Lord ,
59005015	and the prayer of faith will heal him who is sick , and the Lord will raise him up . If he has committed sins , it will be forgiven him .
59005016	Confess your offenses one to another , and pray one for another , that you may be healed . The effective , earnest prayer of a righteous man is powerfully effective .
59005017	Elijah was a man with a nature like ours , and he prayed earnestly that it might not rain , and it didn't rain on the earth for three years and six months .
59005018	He prayed again , and the sky gave rain , and the earth brought forth its fruit .
59005019	Brothers , if any among you wanders from the truth , and someone turns him back ,
59005020	let him know , that he who converts a sinner from the error of his way will save a soul from death , and will cover a multitude of sins .
60001001	Peter , an apostle of Jesus Christ , to the chosen ones who are living as aliens in the Dispersion in Pontus , Galatia , Cappadocia , Asia , and Bithynia ,
60001002	according to the foreknowledge of God the Father , in sanctification of the Spirit , to obedience and sprinkling of the blood of Jesus Christ : Grace to you and peace be multiplied .
60001003	Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , who according to his great mercy became the father of us again to a living hope by the resurrection of Jesus Christ from the dead ,
60001004	to an incorruptible and undefiled inheritance , and that doesn't fade away , reserved in heaven for you ,
60001005	who by the power of God are guarded through faith to a salvation ready to be revealed in the last time .
60001006	Wherein you greatly rejoice , though now for a little while , if need be , you have been put to grief in various trials ,
60001007	that the proof of your faith , which is more precious than gold that perishes even though it is tested by fire , may be found to result in praise and glory and honor at the revelation of Jesus Christ - -
60001008	whom not having known you love ; on whom , though now you don't see him , yet believing , you rejoice greatly with joy unspeakable and full of glory - -
60001009	receiving the end of your faith , the salvation of your souls .
60001010	Concerning this salvation , the prophets sought and searched diligently , who prophesied of the grace that would come to you ,
60001011	searching for what or what kind of time the Spirit of Christ , which was in them , pointed to , when he testified beforehand the sufferings of Christ , and the glories that should follow them .
60001012	To whom it was revealed , that not to themselves , but to you , did they minister these things , which now have been announced to you through those who preached the gospel to you by the Holy Spirit sent forth from heaven ; which things angels desire to look into .
60001013	Therefore , prepare your minds for action , be sober and set your hope perfectly on the grace that will be brought to you at the revelation of Jesus Christ - -
60001014	as children of obedience , not conforming yourselves according to your former lusts as in your ignorance ,
60001015	but just as he who called you is holy , you yourselves also be holy in all of your behavior ;
60001016	because it is written , " You shall be holy ; for I am holy . "
60001017	If you call on him as Father , who without respect of persons judges according to each man's work , pass the time of your living as strangers here in reverent fear :
60001018	knowing that you were redeemed , not with corruptible things , with silver or gold , from the useless way of life handed down from your fathers ,
60001019	but with precious blood , as of a lamb without spot , the blood of Christ ;
60001020	who was foreknown indeed before the foundation of the world , but was revealed at the end of times for your sake ,
60001021	who through him are believers in God , that raised him from the dead , and gave him glory ; so that your faith and hope might be in God .
60001022	Seeing you have purified your souls in your obedience to the truth through the Spirit in sincere brotherly affection , love one another from the heart fervently :
60001023	having been born again , not of corruptible seed , but of incorruptible , through the word of God , which lives and remains forever .
60001024	For , " All flesh is like grass , And all of man's glory like the flower in the grass . The grass withers , and its flower falls ;
60001025	But the Lord's word endures forever . " This is the word of good news which was preached to you .
60002001	Putting away therefore all wickedness , all deceit , hypocrisies , envies , and all evil speaking ,
60002002	as newborn babes , long for the pure milk of the Word , that you may grow thereby ,
60002003	if indeed you have tasted that the Lord is gracious :
60002004	coming to him , a living stone , rejected indeed by men , but chosen by God , precious .
60002005	You also , as living stones , are built up as a spiritual house , to be a holy priesthood , to offer up spiritual sacrifices , acceptable to God through Jesus Christ .
60002006	Because it is contained in scripture , " Behold , I lay in Zion a chief cornerstone , elect , precious : He who believes in him will not be put to shame . "
60002007	For you therefore who believe is the honor , but for such as are disobedient , " The stone which the builders rejected , Has become the chief cornerstone , "
60002008	and , " A stone of stumbling , and a rock of offense . " For they stumble at the word , being disobedient , whereunto also they were appointed .
60002009	But you are an elect race , a royal priesthood , a holy nation , a people for God's own possession , that you may show forth the excellencies of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light :
60002010	who in time past were no people , but now are the people of God , who had not obtained mercy , but now have obtained mercy .
60002011	Beloved , I beg you as sojourners and pilgrims , to abstain from fleshly lust , which war against the soul ;
60002012	having good behavior among the nations , so in that which they speak against you as evil-doers , they may by your good works , which they see , glorify God in the day of visitation .
60002013	Therefore subject yourselves to every ordinance of man for the Lord's sake : whether to the king , as supreme ;
60002014	or to governors , as sent by him for vengeance on evil-doers and for praise to those who do well .
60002015	For so is the will of God , that by well-doing you should put to silence the ignorance of foolish men :
60002016	as free , and not using your freedom for a cloak of wickedness , but as bondservants of God .
60002017	Honor all men . Love the brotherhood . Fear God . Honor the king .
60002018	Servants , be in subjection to your masters with all fear ; not only to the good and gentle , but also to the wicked .
60002019	For it is commendable if someone endures pain , suffering unjustly , because of conscience toward God .
60002020	For what glory is it , if , when you sin , you patiently endure beating ? But if , when you do well , you patiently endure suffering , this is commendable with God .
60002021	For to this were you called , because Christ also suffered for us , leaving us an example , that you should follow his steps ,
60002022	who did not sin , " neither was deceit found in his mouth . "
60002023	Who , when he was reviled , didn't revile back . When he suffered , didn't threaten , but committed himself to him who judges righteously ;
60002024	who his own self bore our sins in his body on the tree , that we , having died to sins , might live to righteousness ; by whose stripes you were healed .
60002025	For you were going astray like sheep ; but are now returned to the Shepherd and Overseer of your souls .
60003001	In like manner , wives , be in subjection to your own husbands ; so that , even if any don't obey the Word , they may be gained by the behavior of their wives without a word ;
60003002	seeing your pure behavior in fear .
60003003	Let your beauty be not just the outward adorning of braiding the hair , and of wearing jewels of gold , or of putting on fine clothing ;
60003004	but in the hidden person of the heart , in the incorruptible adornment of a gentle and quiet spirit , which is in the sight of God very precious .
60003005	For this is how the holy women before , who hoped in God , also adorned themselves , being in subjection to their own husbands :
60003006	as Sarah obeyed Abraham , calling him lord , whose children you now are , if you do well , and are not put in fear by any terror .
60003007	You husbands , in like manner , live with your wives according to knowledge , giving honor to the woman , as to the weaker vessel , as being also joint heirs of the grace of life ; not cutting off your prayers .
60003008	Finally , be all like-minded , compassionate , loving as brothers , tenderhearted , courteous ,
60003009	not rendering evil for evil , or reviling for reviling ; but instead blessing ; knowing that to this were you called , that you may inherit a blessing .
60003010	For , " He who would love life , And see good days , Let him keep his tongue from evil , And his lips from speaking deceit .
60003011	Let him turn away from evil , and do good . Let him seek peace , and pursue it .
60003012	For the eyes of the Lord are on the righteous , And his ears open to their prayer ; But the face of the Lord is against those who do evil . "
60003013	Now who is he who will harm you , if you become imitators of that which is good ?
60003014	But even if you should suffer for righteousness ' sake , you are blessed . " Don't fear what they fear , neither be troubled . "
60003015	But sanctify the Lord God in your hearts : and always be ready to give an answer to everyone who asks you a reason concerning the hope that is in you , with humility and fear :
60003016	having a good conscience ; that , while you are spoken against as evildoers , they may be put to shame who revile your good manner of life in Christ .
60003017	For it is better , if the will of God should so will , that you suffer for doing well than for doing evil .
60003018	Because Christ also suffered for sins once , the righteous for the unrighteous , that he might bring you to God ; being put to death in the flesh , but made alive in the spirit ;
60003019	in which he also went and preached to the spirits in prison ,
60003020	who before were disobedient , when the longsuffering of God waited patiently in the days of Noah , while the ark was being built . In it , few , that is , eight souls , were saved through water .
60003021	This is a symbol of baptism , which now saves you - not the putting away of the filth of the flesh , but the answer of a good conscience toward God , through the resurrection of Jesus Christ ,
60003022	who is at the right hand of God , having gone into heaven , angels and authorities and powers being made subject to him .
60004001	Forasmuch then as Christ suffered for us in the flesh , arm yourselves also with the same mind ; for he who has suffered in the flesh has ceased from sin ;
60004002	that you no longer should live the rest of your time in the flesh to the lusts of men , but to the will of God .
60004003	For we have spent enough of our past time living in doing the desire of the Gentiles , and to have walked in lasciviousness , lusts , drunken binges , orgies , carousings , and abominable idolatries .
60004004	They think it is strange that you don't run with them into the same excess of riot , blaspheming :
60004005	who will give account to him who is ready to judge the living and the dead .
60004006	For to this end was the gospel preached even to the dead , that they might be judged indeed as men in the flesh , but live as to God in the spirit .
60004007	But the end of all things is near . Therefore be of sound mind , self-controlled , and sober in prayer .
60004008	And above all things be earnest in your love among yourselves , for love covers a multitude of sins .
60004009	Be hospitable one to another without grumbling .
60004010	According as each has received a gift , be ministering it among yourselves , as good stewards of the grace of God in its various forms .
60004011	If any man speaks , let it be as it were oracles of God . If any man serves , let it be as of the strength which God supplies , that in all things God may be glorified through Jesus Christ , whose is the glory and the dominion forever and ever . Amen .
60004012	Beloved , don't be astonished at the fiery trial which has come upon you , to test you , as though a strange thing happened to you .
60004013	But because you are partakers of Christ's sufferings , rejoice ; that at the revelation of his glory also you may rejoice with exceeding joy .
60004014	If you are insulted for the name of Christ , blessed are you ; because the Spirit of glory and of God rests on you . On their part he is blasphemed , but on your part he is glorified .
60004015	For let none of you suffer as a murderer , or a thief , or an evil doer , or as a meddler in other men's matters .
60004016	But if one of you suffers for being a Christian , let him not be ashamed ; but let him glorify God in this matter .
60004017	For the time [ has come ] for judgment to begin at the house of God . If it begins first at us , what will happen to those who don't obey the gospel of God ?
60004018	" If it is hard for the righteous to be saved , what will happen to the ungodly and the sinner ? "
60004019	Therefore let them also who suffer according to the will of God in doing good entrust their souls to him , as to a faithful Creator .
60005001	I exhort the elders among you , as a fellow elder , and a witness of the sufferings of Christ , and who will also share in the glory that will be revealed .
60005002	Tend the flock of God which is among you , exercising the oversight , not under compulsion , but voluntarily , not for dishonest gain , but willingly ;
60005003	neither as lording it over the charge allotted to you , but making yourselves examples to the flock .
60005004	When the chief Shepherd will be revealed , you will receive the crown of glory that doesn't fade away .
60005005	Likewise , you younger ones , be subject to the elder . Yes , all of you gird yourselves with humility , to subject yourselves to one another ; for " God resists the proud , but gives grace to the humble . "
60005006	Humble yourselves therefore under the mighty hand of God , that he may exalt you in due time ;
60005007	casting all your worries on him , because he cares for you .
60005008	Be sober and self-controlled . Be watchful . Your adversary the devil , walks about like a roaring lion , seeking whom he may devour .
60005009	Withstand him steadfast in your faith , knowing that your brothers who are in the world are undergoing the same sufferings .
60005010	But may the God of all grace ( who called you to his eternal glory by Christ Jesus ) , after you have suffered a while , perfect , establish , strengthen , and settle you .
60005011	To him be the glory and the power forever and ever . Amen .
60005012	Through Silvanus , our faithful brother , as I consider him , I have written to you briefly , exhorting , and testifying that this is the true grace of God in which you stand .
60005013	She who is in Babylon , elect together with you , greets you ; and so does Mark , my son .
60005014	Greet one another with a kiss of love . Peace be to you all who are in Christ Jesus . Amen .
61001001	Simon Peter , a servant and apostle of Jesus Christ , to those who have obtained a like precious faith with us in the righteousness of our God and Savior , Jesus Christ :
61001002	Grace to you and peace be multiplied in the knowledge of God and of Jesus our Lord ,
61001003	seeing that his divine power has granted to us all things that pertain to life and godliness , through the knowledge of him who called us by his own glory and virtue ;
61001004	whereby he has granted to us his precious and exceedingly great promises ; that through these you may become partakers of the divine nature , having escaped from the corruption that is in that world by lust .
61001005	Yes , and for this very cause adding on your part all diligence , in your faith supply moral excellence ; and in moral excellence , knowledge ;
61001006	and in knowledge , self-control ; and in self-control patience ; and in patience godliness ;
61001007	and in godliness brotherly affection ; and in brotherly affection , love .
61001008	For if these things are yours and abound , they make you to be not idle nor unfruitful to the knowledge of our Lord Jesus Christ .
61001009	For he who lacks these things is blind , seeing only what is near , having forgotten the cleansing from his old sins .
61001010	Therefore , brothers , be more diligent to make your calling and election sure . For if you do these things , you will never stumble .
61001011	For thus will be richly supplied to you the entrance into the eternal kingdom of our Lord and Savior , Jesus Christ .
61001012	Therefore I will not be negligent to remind you of these things , though you know them , and are established in the present truth .
61001013	I think it right , as long as I am in this tent , to stir you up by reminding you ;
61001014	knowing that the putting off of my tent comes swiftly , even as our Lord , Jesus Christ , made clear to me .
61001015	Yes , I will make every effort that you may always be able to remember these things even after my departure .
61001016	For we did not follow cunningly devised fables , when we made known to you the power and coming of our Lord , Jesus Christ , but we were eyewitnesses of his majesty .
61001017	For he received from God the Father honor and glory , when the voice came to him from the Majestic Glory , " This is my beloved Son , in whom I am well pleased . "
61001018	This voice we heard come out of heaven , when we were with him in the holy mountain .
61001019	We have the more sure word of prophecy ; whereunto you do well that you take heed , as to a lamp shining in a dark place , until the day dawns , and the day star arises in your hearts :
61001020	knowing this first , that no prophecy of scripture is of private interpretation .
61001021	For no prophecy ever came by the will of man : but holy men of God spoke , being moved by the Holy Spirit .
61002001	But there also arose false prophets among the people , as among you also there will be false teachers , who will secretly bring in destructive heresies , denying even the Master who bought them , bringing on themselves swift destruction .
61002002	Many will follow their destructive ways , and as a result , the way of the truth will be maligned .
61002003	In covetousness will they exploit you with deceptive words : whose sentence now from of old doesn't linger , and their destruction will not slumber .
61002004	For if God didn't spare angels when they sinned , but cast them down to Tartarus , and committed them to pits of darkness , to be reserved to judgment ;
61002005	and didn't spare the ancient world , but preserved Noah with seven others , a preacher of righteousness , when he brought a flood on the world of the ungodly ;
61002006	and turning the cities of Sodom and Gomorrah into ashes , condemned them to destruction , having made them an example to those who would live ungodly ;
61002007	and delivered righteous Lot , very distressed by the lustful life of the wicked
61002008	( for that righteous man dwelling among them , in seeing and hearing , tormented his righteous soul from day to day with lawless deeds ) :
61002009	the Lord knows how to deliver the godly out of temptation , and to keep the unrighteous under punishment to the day of judgment ;
61002010	but chiefly those who walk after the flesh in the lust of defilement , and despise authority . Daring , self-willed , they are not afraid to speak evil of dignitaries ;
61002011	whereas angels , though greater in might and power , don't bring a railing judgment against them before the Lord .
61002012	But these , as creatures without reason , born mere animals to be taken and destroyed , speaking evil in matters about which they are ignorant , will in their destroying surely be destroyed ,
61002013	receiving the wages of unrighteousness ; people who count it pleasure to revel in the day-time , spots and blemishes , reveling in their deceit while they feast with you ;
61002014	having eyes full of adultery , and who can't cease from sin ; enticing unsettled souls ; having a heart trained in greed ; children of cursing ;
61002015	forsaking the right way , they went astray , having followed the way of Balaam the son of Beor , who loved the wages of wrong-doing ;
61002016	but he was rebuked for his own disobedience . A mute donkey spoke with man's voice and stopped the madness of the prophet .
61002017	These are wells without water , clouds driven by a storm ; for whom the blackness of darkness has been reserved forever .
61002018	For , uttering great swelling words of emptiness , they entice in the lusts of the flesh , by licentiousness , those who are indeed escaping from those who live in error ;
61002019	promising them liberty , while they themselves are bondservants of corruption ; for by whom a man is overcome , by the same is he also brought into bondage .
61002020	For if , after they have escaped the defilement of the world through the knowledge of the Lord and Savior , Jesus Christ , they are again entangled therein and overcome , the last state has become worse with them than the first .
61002021	For it would be better for them not to have known the way of righteousness , than , after knowing it , to turn back from the holy commandment delivered to them .
61002022	But it has happened to them according to the true proverb , " The dog turns to his own vomit again , " and " the sow that had washed to wallowing in the mire . "
61003001	This is now , beloved , the second letter that I have written to you ; and in both of them I stir up your sincere mind by reminding you ;
61003002	that you should remember the words which were spoken before by the holy prophets , and the commandments of us , the apostles of the Lord and Savior :
61003003	knowing this first , that in the last days mockers will come , walking after their own lusts ,
61003004	and saying , " Where is the promise of his coming ? " For , from the day that the fathers fell asleep , all things continue as they were from the beginning of the creation .
61003005	For this they willfully forget , that there were heavens from of old , and an earth formed out of water and amid water , by the word of God ;
61003006	by which means the world that then was , being overflowed with water , perished .
61003007	But the heavens that now are , and the earth , by the same word have been stored up for fire , being reserved against the day of judgment and destruction of ungodly men .
61003008	But don't forget this one thing , beloved , that one day is with the Lord as a thousand years , and a thousand years as one day .
61003009	The Lord is not slow concerning his promise , as some count slowness ; but is longsuffering towards us , not wishing that any should perish , but that all should come to repentance .
61003010	But the day of the Lord will come as a thief in the night ; in which the heavens will pass away with a great noise , and the elements will be dissolved with fervent heat , and the earth and the works that are in it will be burned up .
61003011	Therefore since all these things are thus to be destroyed , what manner of persons ought you to be in holy living and godliness ,
61003012	looking for and earnestly desiring the coming of the day of God , by reason of which the heavens being on fire will be dissolved , and the elements will melt with fervent heat ?
61003013	But , according to his promise , we look for new heavens and a new earth , in which dwells righteousness .
61003014	Therefore , beloved , seeing that you look for these things , be diligent to be found in peace , without blemish and blameless in his sight .
61003015	Regard the patience of our Lord as salvation ; even as our beloved brother Paul also , according to the wisdom given to him , wrote to you ;
61003016	as also in all of his letters , speaking in them of these things . In those are some things hard to be understood , which the ignorant and unsettled twist , as they do also to the other scriptures , to their own destruction .
61003017	You therefore , beloved , knowing these things beforehand , beware lest , being carried away with the error of the wicked , you fall from your own steadfastness .
61003018	But grow in the grace and knowledge of our Lord and Savior Jesus Christ . To him be the glory both now and forever . Amen .
62001001	That which was from the beginning , that which we have heard , that which we have seen with our eyes , that which we saw , and our hands touched , concerning the Word of life
62001002	( and the life was revealed , and we have seen , and testify , and declare to you the life , the eternal life , which was with the Father , and was revealed to us ) ;
62001003	that which we have seen and heard we declare to you , that you also may have fellowship with us . Yes , and our fellowship is with the Father , and with his Son , Jesus Christ .
62001004	And we write these things to you , that our joy may be fulfilled .
62001005	This is the message which we have heard from him and announce to you , that God is light , and in him is no darkness at all .
62001006	If we say that we have fellowship with him and walk in the darkness , we lie , and don't tell the truth .
62001007	But if we walk in the light , as he is in the light , we have fellowship with one another , and the blood of Jesus Christ , his Son , cleanses us from all sin .
62001008	If we say that we have no sin , we deceive ourselves , and the truth is not in us .
62001009	If we confess our sins , he is faithful and righteous to forgive us the sins , and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness .
62001010	If we say that we haven't sinned , we make him a liar , and his word is not in us .
62002001	My little children , I write these things to you so that you may not sin . If anyone sins , we have a Counselor with the Father , Jesus Christ , the righteous .
62002002	And he is the atoning sacrifice for our sins , and not for ours only , but also for the whole world .
62002003	This is how we know that we know him : if we keep his commandments .
62002004	He who says , " I know him , " and doesn't keep his commandments , is a liar , and the truth is not in him .
62002005	But whoever keeps his word , God's love has most assuredly been perfected in him . This is how we know that we are in him :
62002006	he who says he remains in him ought himself also to walk just like he walked .
62002007	Brothers , I write no new commandment to you , but an old commandment which you had from the beginning . The old commandment is the word which you heard from the beginning .
62002008	Again , I write a new commandment to you , which thing is true in him and in you ; because the darkness is passing away , and the true light already shines .
62002009	He who says he is in the light and hates his brother , is in the darkness even until now .
62002010	He who loves his brother remains in the light , and there is no occasion for stumbling in him .
62002011	But he who hates his brother is in the darkness , and walks in the darkness , and doesn't know where he is going , because the darkness has blinded his eyes .
62002012	I write to you , little children , because your sins are forgiven you for his name's sake .
62002013	I write to you , fathers , because you know him who is from the beginning . I write to you , young men , because you have overcome the evil one . I write to you , little children , because you know the Father .
62002014	I have written to you , fathers , because you know him who is from the beginning . I have written to you , young men , because you are strong , and the word of God remains in you , and you have overcome the evil one .
62002015	Don't love the world , neither the things that are in the world . If anyone loves the world , the Father's love isn't in him .
62002016	For all that is in the world , the lust of the flesh , the lust of the eyes , and the pride of life , isn't the Father's , but is the world's .
62002017	The world is passing away with its lusts , but he who does God's will remains forever .
62002018	Little children , these are the end times , and as you heard that the Antichrist is coming , even now many antichrists have arisen . By this we know that it is the end times .
62002019	They went out from us , but they didn't belong to us ; for if they had belonged to us , they would have continued with us . But they left , that they might be revealed that none of them belong to us .
62002020	You have an anointing from the Holy One , and you know the truth .
62002021	I have not written to you because you don't know the truth , but because you know it , and because no lie is of the truth .
62002022	Who is the liar but he who denies that Jesus is the Christ ? This is the Antichrist , he who denies the Father and the Son .
62002023	Whoever denies the Son , the same doesn't have the Father . He who confesses the Son has the Father also .
62002024	Therefore , as for you , let that remain in you which you heard from the beginning . If that which you heard from the beginning remains in you , you also will remain in the Son , and in the Father .
62002025	This is the promise which he promised us , the eternal life .
62002026	These things I have written to you concerning those who would lead you astray .
62002027	As for you , the anointing which you received from him remains in you , and you don't need for anyone to teach you . But as his anointing teaches you concerning all things , and is true , and is no lie , and even as it taught you , you will remain in him .
62002028	Now , little children , remain in him , that when he appears , we may have boldness , and not be ashamed before him at his coming .
62002029	If you know that he is righteous , you know that everyone who practices righteousness is born of him .
62003001	Behold , how great a love the Father has bestowed on us , that we should be called children of God ! For this cause the world doesn't know us , because it didn't know him .
62003002	Beloved , now we are children of God , and it is not yet revealed what we will be . But we know that , when he is revealed , we will be like him ; for we will see him just as he is .
62003003	Everyone who has this hope set on him purifies himself , even as he is pure .
62003004	Everyone who sins also commits lawlessness . Sin is lawlessness .
62003005	You know that he was revealed to take away our sins , and in him is no sin .
62003006	Whoever remains in him doesn't sin . Whoever sins hasn't seen him , neither knows him .
62003007	Little children , let no one lead you astray . He who does righteousness is righteous , even as he is righteous .
62003008	He who sins is of the devil , for the devil has been sinning from the beginning . To this end the Son of God was revealed , that he might destroy the works of the devil .
62003009	Whoever is born of God doesn't commit sin , because his seed remains in him ; and he can't sin , because he is born of God .
62003010	In this the children of God are revealed , and the children of the devil . Whoever doesn't do righteousness is not of God , neither is he who doesn't love his brother .
62003011	For this is the message which you heard from the beginning , that we should love one another ;
62003012	unlike Cain , who was of the evil one , and killed his brother . Why did he kill him ? Because his works were evil , and his brother's righteous .
62003013	Don't be surprised , my brothers , if the world hates you .
62003014	We know that we have passed out of death into life , because we love the brothers . He who doesn't love his brother remains in death .
62003015	Whoever hates his brother is a murderer , and you know that no murderer has eternal life remaining in him .
62003016	By this we know love , because he laid down his life for us . We ought to lay down our lives for the brothers .
62003017	But whoever has the world's goods , and sees his brother in need , and shuts up his compassion from him , how does the love of God remain in him ?
62003018	My little children , let's not love in word only , neither with the tongue only , but in deed and truth .
62003019	And by this we know that we are of the truth , and persuade our hearts before him ,
62003020	because if our heart condemns us , God is greater than our heart , and knows all things .
62003021	Beloved , if our hearts don't condemn us , we have boldness toward God ;
62003022	and whatever we ask , we receive from him , because we keep his commandments and do the things that are pleasing in his sight .
62003023	This is his commandment , that we should believe in the name of his Son , Jesus Christ , and love one another , even as he commanded .
62003024	He who keeps his commandments remains in him , and he in him . By this we know that he remains in us , by the Spirit which he gave us .
62004001	Beloved , don't believe every spirit , but test the spirits , whether they are of God , because many false prophets have gone out into the world .
62004002	By this you know the Spirit of God : every spirit who confesses that Jesus Christ has come in the flesh is of God ,
62004003	and every spirit who doesn't confess that Jesus Christ has come in the flesh is not of God , and this is the spirit of the antichrist , of whom you have heard that it comes . Now it is in the world already .
62004004	You are of God , little children , and have overcome them ; because greater is he who is in you than he who is in the world .
62004005	They are of the world . Therefore they speak of the world , and the world hears them .
62004006	We are of God . He who knows God listens to us . He who is not of God doesn't listen to us . By this we know the spirit of truth , and the spirit of error .
62004007	Beloved , let us love one another , for love is of God ; and everyone who loves is born of God , and knows God .
62004008	He who doesn't love doesn't know God , for God is love .
62004009	By this was God's love revealed in us , that God has sent his only born Son into the world that we might live through him .
62004010	In this is love , not that we loved God , but that he loved us , and sent his Son as the atoning sacrifice for our sins .
62004011	Beloved , if God loved us so , we also ought to love one another .
62004012	No one has seen God at any time . If we love one another , God remains in us , and his love has been perfected in us .
62004013	By this we know that we remain in him and he in us , because he has given us of his Spirit .
62004014	We have seen and testify that the Father has sent the Son as the Savior of the world .
62004015	Whoever will confess that Jesus is the Son of God , God remains in him , and he in God .
62004016	We know and have believed the love which God has in us . God is love , and he who remains in love remains in God , and God remains in him .
62004017	In this love has been made perfect with us , that we may have boldness in the day of judgment , because as he is , even so are we in this world .
62004018	There is no fear in love ; but perfect love casts out fear , because fear has punishment . He who fears is not made perfect in love .
62004019	We love Him , because he first loved us .
62004020	If a man says , " I love God , " and hates his brother , he is a liar ; for he who doesn't love his brother whom he has seen , how can he love God whom he has not seen ?
62004021	This commandment have we from him , that he who loves God should also love his brother .
62005001	Whoever believes that Jesus is the Christ is born of God . Whoever loves the father also loves the child who is born of him .
62005002	By this we know that we love the children of God , when we love God and keep his commandments .
62005003	For this is the love of God , that we keep his commandments . His commandments are not grievous .
62005004	For whatever is born of God overcomes the world . This is the victory that has overcome the world : your faith .
62005005	Who is he who overcomes the world , but he who believes that Jesus is the Son of God ?
62005006	This is he who came by water and blood , Jesus Christ ; not with the water only , but with the water and the blood .
62005007	It is the Spirit who bears witness , because the Spirit is the truth .
62005008	For there are three who bear witness , the Spirit , and the water , and the blood ; and the three agree as one .
62005009	If we receive the witness of men , the witness of God is greater ; for this is God's testimony which he has testified concerning his Son .
62005010	He who believes in the Son of God has the witness in him . He who doesn't believe God has made him a liar , because he has not believed in the testimony that God has given concerning his Son .
62005011	The testimony is this , that God gave to us eternal life , and this life is in his Son .
62005012	He who has the Son has the life . He who doesn't have God's Son doesn't have the life .
62005013	These things I have written to you who believe in the name of the Son of God , that you may know that you have eternal life , and that you may continue to believe in the name of the Son of God .
62005014	This is the boldness which we have toward him , that , if we ask anything according to his will , he listens to us .
62005015	And if we know that he listens to us whatever we ask , we know that we have the petitions which we have asked of him .
62005016	If anyone sees his brother sinning a sin not leading to death , he shall ask , and God will give him life for those who sin not to death . There is a sin leading to death . I don't say that concerning this he should make a request .
62005017	All unrighteousness is sin , and there is a sin not leading to death .
62005018	We know that whoever is born of God doesn't sin , but he who was born of God keeps himself , and the evil one doesn't touch him .
62005019	We know that we are of God , and the whole world lies in the power of the evil one .
62005020	We know that the Son of God has come , and has given us an understanding , that we know him who is true , and we are in him who is true , in his Son Jesus Christ . This is the true God , and eternal life .
62005021	Little children , keep yourselves from idols .
63001001	The elder , to the elect lady and her children , whom I love in truth ; and not I only , but also all those who know the truth ;
63001002	for the truth's sake , which remains in us , and it will be with us forever :
63001003	Grace , mercy , and peace will be with us , from God the Father , and from the Lord Jesus Christ , the Son of the Father , in truth and love .
63001004	I rejoice greatly that I have found some of your children walking in truth , even as we have been commanded by the Father .
63001005	Now I beg you , dear lady , not as though I wrote to you a new commandment , but that which we had from the beginning , that we love one another .
63001006	This is love , that we should walk according to his commandments . This is the commandment , even as you heard from the beginning , that you should walk in it .
63001007	For many deceivers have gone out into the world , those who don't confess that Jesus Christ came in the flesh . This is the deceiver and the Antichrist .
63001008	Watch yourselves , that we don't lose the things which we have accomplished , but that we receive a full reward .
63001009	Whoever transgresses and doesn't remain in the teaching of Christ , doesn't have God . He who remains in the teaching , the same has both the Father and the Son .
63001010	If anyone comes to you , and doesn't bring this teaching , don't receive him into your house , and don't welcome him ,
63001011	for he who welcomes him participates in his evil works .
63001012	Having many things to write to you , I don't want to do so with paper and ink , but I hope to come to you , and to speak face to face , that our joy may be made full .
63001013	The children of your chosen sister greet you . Amen .

64001003	For I rejoiced greatly , when brothers came and testified about your truth , even as you walk in truth .
64001004	I have no greater joy than this , to hear about my children walking in truth .
64001005	Beloved , you do a faithful work in whatever you accomplish for those who are brothers and strangers .

65001001	Jude , a servant of Jesus Christ , and brother of James , to those who are called , sanctified by God the Father , and kept for Jesus Christ :
65001002	Mercy to you and peace and love be multiplied .
65001003	Beloved , while I was very eager to write to you about our common salvation , I was constrained to write to you exhorting you to contend earnestly for the faith which was once for all delivered to the saints .
65001004	For there are certain men who crept in secretly , even they who were of old written of beforehand to this condemnation : ungodly men , turning the grace of our God into lasciviousness , and denying our only Master , God , and Lord , Jesus Christ .
65001005	Now I desire to remind you , though you already know this , that the Lord , having saved a people out of the land of Egypt , afterward destroyed those who didn't believe .
65001006	Angels who didn't keep their first domain , but deserted their own dwelling place , he has kept in everlasting bonds under darkness for the judgment of the great day .
65001007	Even as Sodom and Gomorrah , and the cities around them , having , in the same way as these , given themselves over to sexual immorality and gone after strange flesh , are set forth as an example , suffering the punishment of eternal fire .
65001008	Yet in like manner these also in their dreaming defile the flesh , despise authority , and slander celestial beings .
65001009	But Michael , the archangel , when contending with the devil and arguing about the body of Moses , dared not bring against him an abusive condemnation , but said , " May the Lord rebuke you ! "
65001010	But these speak evil of whatever things they don't know . What they understand naturally , like the creatures without reason , in these things are they destroyed .
65001011	Woe to them ! For they went in the way of Cain , and ran riotously in the error of Balaam for hire , and perished in Korah's rebellion .
65001012	These are hidden rocky reefs in your love feasts when they feast with you , shepherds who without fear feed themselves ; clouds without water , carried along by winds ; autumn leaves without fruit , twice dead , plucked up by the roots ;
65001013	wild waves of the sea , foaming out their own shame ; wandering stars , for whom the blackness of darkness has been reserved forever .
65001014	To these also Enoch , the seventh from Adam , prophesied , saying , " Behold , the Lord came with ten thousands of his holy ones ,
65001015	to execute judgment on all , and to convict all the ungodly of all their works of ungodliness which they have done in an ungodly way , and of all the hard things which ungodly sinners have spoken against him . "
65001016	These are murmurers and complainers , walking after their lusts ( and their mouth speaks proud things ) , showing respect of persons for the sake of advantage .
65001017	But you , beloved , remember the words which have been spoken before by the apostles of our Lord Jesus Christ .
65001018	They said to you that " In the last time there will be mockers , walking after their own ungodly lusts . "
65001019	These are they who cause divisions , and are sensual , not having the Spirit .
65001020	But you , beloved , keep building up yourselves on your most holy faith , praying in the Holy Spirit .
65001021	Keep yourselves in the love of God , looking for the mercy of our Lord Jesus Christ to eternal life .
65001022	On some have compassion , making a distinction ,
65001023	and some save , snatching them out of the fire with fear , hating even the clothing stained by the flesh .
65001024	Now to him who is able to keep them from stumbling , and to present you faultless before the presence of his glory in great joy ,
65001025	to God our Savior , who alone is wise , be glory and majesty , dominion and power , both now and forever . Amen .

66001006	and he made us to be a kingdom , priests to his God and Father ; to him be the glory and the dominion forever and ever . Amen .

66001008	" I am the Alpha and the Omega , the Beginning and the End , " says the Lord God , " who is and who was and who is to come , the Almighty . "
66001009	I John , your brother and partaker with you in oppression and kingdom and perseverance which are in Jesus , was on the isle that is called Patmos because of God's Word and the testimony of Jesus Christ .
66001010	I was in the Spirit on the Lord's day , and I heard behind me a loud voice , as of a trumpet
66001011	saying , " What you see , write in a book and send to the seven assemblies : to Ephesus , Smyrna , Pergamum , Thyatira , Sardis , Philadelphia , and to Laodicea . "
66001012	I turned to see the voice that spoke with me . Having turned , I saw seven golden lampstands .
66001013	And in the midst of the lampstands was one like a son of man , clothed with a robe reaching down to his feet , and with a golden sash around his chest .
66001014	His head and his hair were white as white wool , like snow . His eyes were like a flame of fire .
66001015	His feet were like burnished brass , as if it had been refined in a furnace . His voice was like the voice of many waters .
66001016	He had seven stars in his right hand . Out of his mouth proceeded a sharp two-edged sword . His face was like the sun shining at its brightest .
66001017	When I saw him , I fell at his feet like a dead man . He laid his right hand on me , saying , " Don't be afraid . I am the first and the last ,
66001018	and the Living one . I was dead , and behold , I am alive forevermore . I have the keys of Death and of Hades .
66001019	Write therefore the things which you have seen , and the things which are , and the things which will happen hereafter ;
66001020	the mystery of the seven stars which you saw in my right hand , and the seven golden lampstands . The seven stars are the angels of the seven assemblies . The seven lampstands are seven assemblies .
66002001	To the angel of the assembly in Ephesus write : " He who holds the seven stars in his right hand , he who walks in the midst of the seven golden lampstands says these things :
66002002	" I know your works , and your toil and perseverance , and that you can't tolerate evil men , and have tested those who call themselves apostles , and they are not , and found them false .
66002003	You have perseverance and have endured for my name's sake , and have not grown weary .
66002004	But I have this against you , that you left your first love .
66002005	Remember therefore from where you have fallen , and repent and do the first works ; or else I am coming to you , and will move your lampstand out of its place , unless you repent .
66002006	But this you have , that you hate the works of the Nicolaitans , which I also hate .
66002007	He who has an ear , let him hear what the Spirit says to the assemblies . To him who overcomes I will give to eat of the tree of life , which is in the Paradise of my God .
66002008	" To the angel of the assembly in Smyrna write : " The first and the last , who was dead , and has come to life says these things :
66002009	" I know your oppression , and your poverty ( but you are rich ) , and the blasphemy of those who say they are Jews , and they are not , but are a synagogue of Satan .
66002010	Don't be afraid of the things which you are about to suffer . Behold , the devil is about to throw some of you into prison , that you may be tested ; and you will have oppression for ten days . Be faithful to death , and I will give you the crown of life .
66002011	He who has an ear , let him hear what the Spirit says to the assemblies . He who overcomes won't be hurt by the second death .
66002012	" To the angel of the assembly in Pergamum write : " He who has the sharp two-edged sword says these things :
66002013	" I know your works and where you dwell , where Satan's throne is . You hold firmly to my name , and didn't deny my faith , even in the days of Antipas my witness , my faithful one , who was killed among you , where Satan dwells .
66002014	But I have a few things against you , because you have there some who hold the teaching of Balaam , who taught Balak to throw a stumbling block before the children of Israel , to eat things sacrificed to idols , and to commit sexual immorality .
66002015	So you also have some who hold to the teaching of the Nicolaitans in the same way .
66002016	Repent therefore , or else I am coming to you quickly , and I will make war against them with the sword of my mouth .
66002017	He who has an ear , let him hear what the Spirit says to the assemblies . To him who overcomes , to him will I give of the hidden manna , and I will give him a white stone , and on the stone a new name written , which no one knows but he who receives it .
66002018	" To the angel of the assembly in Thyatira write : " The Son of God , who has his eyes like a flame of fire , and his feet are like burnished brass , says these things :
66002019	I know your works , your love , faith , service , patient endurance , and that your last works are more than the first .
66002020	But I have this against you , that you tolerate your woman , Jezebel , who calls herself a prophetess . She teaches and seduces my servants to commit sexual immorality , and to eat things sacrificed to idols .
66002021	I gave her time to repent , but she refuses to repent of her sexual immorality .
66002022	Behold , I will throw her into a bed , and those who commit adultery with her into great oppression , unless they repent of her works .
66002023	I will kill her children with Death , and all the assemblies will know that I am he who searches the minds and hearts . I will give to each one of you according to your deeds .
66002024	But to you I say , to the rest who are in Thyatira , as many as don't have this teaching , who don't know what some call ' the deep things of Satan , ' to you I say , I don't lay on you any other burden .
66002025	Nevertheless that which you have , hold firmly until I come .
66002026	He who overcomes , and he who keeps my works to the end , to him will I give authority over the nations .
66002027	He will rule them with a rod of iron , shattering them like clay pots ; as I also have received of my Father :
66002028	and I will give him the morning star .
66002029	He who has an ear , let him hear what the Spirit says to the assemblies .
66003001	" And to the angel of the assembly in Sardis write : He who has the seven Spirits of God , and the seven stars says these things : " I know your works , that you have a reputation of being alive , but you are dead .
66003002	Wake up , and establish the things that remain , which were ready to die , for I have found no works of yours perfected before my God .

66003015	" I know your works , that you are neither cold nor hot . I wish you were cold or hot .
66003016	So , because you are lukewarm , and neither hot nor cold , I will vomit you out of my mouth .

66003018	I counsel you to buy from me gold refined by fire , that you may become rich ; and white garments , that you may clothe yourself , and that the shame of your nakedness may not be revealed ; and eye salve to anoint your eyes , that you may see .
