66004001	After these things I looked and saw a door opened in heaven , and the first voice that I heard , like a trumpet speaking with me , was one saying , " Come up here , and I will show you the things which must happen after this . "
66004002	Immediately I was in the Spirit . Behold , there was a throne set in heaven , and one sitting on the throne
66004003	that looked like a jasper stone and a sardius . There was a rainbow around the throne , like an emerald to look at .
66004004	Around the throne were twenty-four thrones . On the thrones were twenty-four elders sitting , dressed in white garments , with crowns of gold on their heads .
66004005	Out of the throne proceed lightnings , sounds , and thunders . There were seven lamps of fire burning before the throne , which are the seven Spirits of God .
66004006	Before the throne was something like a sea of glass , like a crystal . In the midst of the throne , and around the throne were four living creatures full of eyes before and behind .
66004007	The first creature was like a lion , and the second creature like a calf , and the third creature had a face like a man , and the fourth creature was like a flying eagle .
66004008	and the four living creatures , having each one of them six wings , are full of eyes around about and within . They have no rest day and night , saying , Holy , holy , holy is the Lord God , the Almighty , who was and who is and who is to come .
66004009	When the living creatures give glory , honor , and thanks to him who sits on the throne , to him who lives forever and ever ,
66004010	the twenty-four elders fall down before him who sits on the throne , and worship him who lives forever and ever , and will throw their crowns before the throne , saying ,
66004011	" Worthy are you , our Lord and our God , to receive the glory , the honor , and the power , for you created all things , and because of your desire they existed , and were created . "
66005001	I saw , in the right hand of him who sat on the throne , a book written within and on the back , sealed shut with seven seals .
66005002	I saw a mighty angel proclaiming with a loud voice , " Who is worthy to open the book , and to break its seals ? "
66005003	No one in heaven , or on the earth , or under the earth , was able to open the book , or to look in it .
66005004	And I wept much , because no one was found worthy to open the book , or to look in it .
66005005	One of the elders said to me , " Don't weep . Behold , the Lion who is of the tribe of Judah , the Root of David , has overcome to open the book and its seven seals . "
66005006	I saw in the midst of the throne and of the four living creatures , and in the midst of the elders , a Lamb standing , as though it had been slain , having seven horns , and seven eyes , which are the seven Spirits of God , sent forth into all the earth .
66005007	Then he came , and he took it out of the right hand of him who sat on the throne .

66005010	And made them kings and priests to our God , And they reign on earth . "
66005011	I saw , and I heard a voice of many angels around the throne , the living creatures , and the elders ; and the number of them was ten thousands of ten thousands , and thousands of thousands ;
66005012	saying with a loud voice , " Worthy is the Lamb who has been killed to receive the power , riches , wisdom , might , honor , glory , and blessing ! "

66005014	The four living creatures said , " Amen ! " The elders fell down and worshipped .

66006002	I saw , and behold , a white horse , and he who sat on it had a bow . A crown was given to him , and he came forth conquering , and to conquer .

66006007	When he opened the fourth seal , I heard the voice of the fourth living creature saying , " Come and see ! "
66006008	I saw , and behold , a pale horse . He who sat on him , his name was Death . Hades followed with him . Authority over one fourth of the earth , to kill with the sword , with famine , with death , and by the wild animals of the earth was given to them .
66006009	When he opened the fifth seal , I saw underneath the altar the souls of those who had been killed for the word of God , and for the testimony which they held .
66006010	They cried with a loud voice , saying , " How long , Master , the holy and true , do you not judge and avenge our blood on those who dwell on the earth ? "

66006012	I saw when he opened the sixth seal , and there was a great earthquake . The sun became black as sackcloth made of hair , and the whole moon became as blood .
66006013	The stars of the sky fell to the earth , as a fig tree drops its unripe figs when it is shaken by a great wind .
66006014	The sky was removed as a scroll when it is rolled up . Every mountain and island were moved out of their places .
66006015	The kings of the earth , the princes , the commanding officers , the rich , the strong , and every slave and freeman , hid themselves in the caves and in the rocks of the mountains .

66006017	for the great day of his wrath has come ; and who is able to stand ? "
66007001	After this , I saw four angels standing at the four corners of the earth , holding the four winds of the earth , so that no wind would blow on the earth , or on the sea , or on any tree .
66007002	I saw another angel ascend from the sunrise , having the seal of the living God . He cried with a loud voice to the four angels to whom it was given to harm the earth and the sea ,
66007003	saying , " Don't harm the earth , neither the sea , nor the trees , until we have sealed the bondservants of our God on their foreheads ! "

66008008	The second angel sounded , and something like a great mountain burning with fire was thrown into the sea . One third of the sea became blood ,
66008009	and one third of the creatures which were in the sea died , those who had life . One third of the ships were destroyed .
66008010	The third angel sounded , and a great star fell from the sky , burning like a torch , and it fell on one third of the rivers , and on the springs of the waters .
66008011	The name of the star is called " Wormwood . " One third of the waters became wormwood . Many men died from the waters , because they were made bitter .
66008012	The fourth angel sounded , and one third of the sun was struck , and one third of the moon , and one third of the stars ; so that one third of them would be darkened , and the day wouldn't shine for one third of it , and the night in the same way .
66008013	I saw , and I heard an eagle , flying in mid heaven , saying with a loud voice , " Woe ! Woe ! Woe for those who dwell on the earth , because of the other voices of the trumpets of the three angels , who are yet to sound .
66009001	The fifth angel sounded , and I saw a star from the sky fallen to the earth . The key to the pit of the abyss was given to him .
66009002	He opened the pit of the abyss , and smoke went up out of the pit , like the smoke from a great furnace . The sun and the air were darkened because of the smoke from the pit .
66009003	Then out of the smoke came forth locusts on the earth , and power was given to them , as the scorpions of the earth have power .
66009004	They were told that they should not hurt the grass of the earth , neither any green thing , neither any tree , but only those men who don't have God's seal on their foreheads .
66009005	They were given power not to kill them , but to torment them for five months . Their torment was like the torment of a scorpion , when it strikes a man .
66009006	In those days men will seek death , and will in no way find it . They will desire to die , and death will flee from them .
66009007	The shapes of the locusts were like horses prepared for war . On their heads were something like gold crowns , and their faces were like men's faces .
66009008	They had hair like women's hair , and their teeth were like those of lions .
66009009	They had breastplates , like breastplates of iron . The sound of their wings was like the sound of chariots , or of many horses rushing to war .

66017006	I saw the woman drunken with the blood of the saints , and with the blood of the martyrs of Jesus . When I saw her , I wondered with great amazement .
66017007	The angel said to me , " Why do you wonder ? I will tell you the mystery of the woman , and of the beast that carries her , which has the seven heads and the ten horns .
66017008	The beast that you saw was , and is not ; and is about to come up out of the abyss , and to go into destruction . Those who dwell on the earth will wonder , whose name has not been written in the book of life from the foundation of the world , when they see the beast , how that he was , and is not , and will come .
66017009	Here is the mind that has wisdom . The seven heads are seven mountains , on which the woman sits .

66017011	The beast that was , and is not , is himself also an eighth , and is of the seven ; and he goes to destruction .
66017012	The ten horns that you saw are ten kings , who have received no kingdom as yet , but they receive authority as kings , with the beast , for one hour .
66017013	These have one mind , and they give their power and authority to the beast .
66017014	These will war against the Lamb , and the Lamb will overcome them , for he is Lord of lords , and King of kings . They also will overcome who are with him , called and chosen and faithful . "

66017016	The ten horns which you saw , and the beast , these will hate the prostitute , and will make her desolate and naked , and will eat her flesh , and will burn her utterly with fire .

66018001	After these things , I saw another angel coming down out of the sky , having great authority . The earth was illuminated with his glory .
66018002	He cried with a mighty voice , saying , " Fallen , fallen is Babylon the great , and has become a habitation of demons , and a prison of every unclean spirit , and a prison of every unclean and hateful bird !
66018003	For all the nations have drunk of the wine of the wrath of her sexual immorality , the kings of the earth committed sexual immorality with her , and the merchants of the earth grew rich from the abundance of her luxury . "

66018006	Return to her just as she returned , and double to her the double according to her works . In the cup which she mixed , mix to her double .
66018007	However much she glorified herself , and grew wanton , so much give her of torment and mourning . For she says in her heart , ' I sit a queen , and am no widow , and will in no way see mourning . '
66018008	Therefore in one day her plagues will come : death , mourning , and famine ; and she will be utterly burned with fire ; for the Lord God who has judged her is strong .
66018009	The kings of the earth , who committed sexual immorality and lived wantonly with her , will weep and wail over her , when they look at the smoke of her burning ,

66018011	The merchants of the earth weep and mourn over her , for no one buys their merchandise any more ;
66018012	merchandise of gold , silver , precious stones , pearls , fine linen , purple , silk , scarlet , all expensive wood , every vessel of ivory , every vessel made of most precious wood , and of brass , and iron , and marble ;
66018013	and cinnamon , spices , incense , ointment , frankincense , wine , oil , fine flour , wheat , cattle , and sheep ; and merchandise of horses and chariots and slaves ; and souls of men .
66018014	The fruits which your soul lusted after have been lost to you , and all things that were dainty and sumptuous have perished from you , and you will find them no more at all .
66018015	The merchants of these things , who were made rich by her , will stand far away for the fear of her torment , weeping and mourning ;
66018016	saying , ' Woe , woe , the great city , she who was dressed in fine linen , purple , and scarlet , and decked with gold and precious stones and pearls !
66018017	For in an hour such great riches are made desolate . ' Every shipmaster , and everyone who sails anywhere , and mariners , and as many as gain their living by sea , stood far away ,
66018018	and cried out as they looked at the smoke of her burning , saying , ' What is like the great city ? '
66018019	They cast dust on their heads , and cried , weeping and mourning , saying , ' Woe , woe , the great city , in which all who had their ships in the sea were made rich by reason of her great wealth ! ' For in one hour is she made desolate .
66018020	Rejoice over her , O heaven , you saints , you apostles , and you prophets ; for God has judged your judgment on her . "
66018021	A mighty angel took up a stone like a great millstone and cast it into the sea , saying , " Thus with violence will Babylon , the great city , be thrown down , and will be found no more at all .
66018022	The voice of harpers and minstrels and flute players and trumpeters will be heard no more at all in you . No craftsman , of whatever craft , will be found any more at all in you . The sound of a mill will be heard no more at all in you .
66018023	The light of a lamp will shine no more at all in you . The voice of the bridegroom and of the bride will be heard no more at all in you ; for your merchants were the princes of the earth ; for with your sorcery all the nations were deceived .
66018024	In her was found the blood of prophets and of saints , and of all who have been slain on the earth . "

66021011	having the glory of God . Her light was like a most precious stone , as if it was a jasper stone , clear as crystal ;
66021012	having a great and high wall ; having twelve gates , and at the gates twelve angels ; and names written on them , which are the names of the twelve tribes of the children of Israel .

66021017	He measured its wall , one hundred forty-four cubits , by the measure of a man , that is , of an angel .
66021018	The construction of its wall was jasper . The city was pure gold , like pure glass .

66021020	the fifth , sardonyx ; the sixth , sardius ; the seventh , chrysolite ; the eighth , beryl ; the ninth , topaz ; the tenth , chrysoprasus ; the eleventh , jacinth ; and the twelfth , amethyst .
66021021	The twelve gates were twelve pearls . Each one of the gates was made of one pearl . The street of the city was pure gold , like transparent glass .
